campaign.story:
This campaign is funding the first two issues of Joystick Angels! 
A NEW comic series written by T.J. and Spencer Sterling, Illustrated by Nats "Shun" Ledesma, colored by Loris Ravina and lettered by Deron Bennett of Andworld Design. This will be a full color, 54-page comic book with some very cool Variant Covers!
Joystick Angels Issue 1 Cover A - by the Xong Bros
Joystick Angels Issue 1 Cover B - by Marcus Williams
The purpose of this campaign and our mission is to help put this entertaining and unique comic series Joystick Angels into the hands of people all over the world and continue to celebrate positive and uplifting black stories in comics.

It is also our prime mission to bring many more of our creative projects to life with the help of the Kickstarter community and more.
The Joystick Angels by Welinthon Nommo
JOYSTICK ANGELS is a sci-fi space opera action story about a squadron of five teenage space pilots that called The Angels who seek glory and retribution against the evil alien parasite empire who destroyed Earth. These space pilots Fox, Deuce, Tank, Dragonetti and Legz live on a satellite space vessel called The Libor Space Station, the last surviving Human colony in the universe. 
The Angels along with a full fleet of space squadrons are tasked with fighting an the alien empire called the Eukarya. 
But before the Angels can fulfill their mission they must compete against the entire space fleet in the QuantumEliteSpace Tournament for ultimate supremacy and the title of Supreme Squadron. A competition that takes places once every decade to determine who can lead the charge against and protect human existence.  

Issue 1 of this 6 part comic series (offered in this Kickstarter) is 26 pages. Also available as add ons are other titles from RAE Comics such as Okemus Issue 0, 1, 2, 3,4.  
My brother and I created Joystick Angels for ALL the fans of 90's starship shootem up video games and epic space opera stories. JOYSTICK ANGELS is safe and fun for all ages but we suggest readers that are 6 and up read this story due to the high powered action scenes.

Similar to Star Trek, Top Gun and games like Starfox, Gradius and Darius Twin, Joystick Angels plays with various archetypes, themes, concepts as well as non-linear storytelling to craft an epic tale that has very unique characters and situations.

But if you dig deeper, all these elements speak to a much more profound meaning...within all of us there is greatness and it's up to us to explore that greatness fully and live our dreams. 
Campaign art by Hendry Prasetya
But THERE'S MORE! The Joystick Angels comic book has it's own custom Musical soundtrack! Thats right Joystick Angels has it's own OST (Original Soundtrack) courtesy of J. Spenser Sterling and MITT MUSIC! 
J. Spenser Sterling a prolific and accomplished Producer, Engineer and Artist who has worked for Universal Music, brings his unique talent to the Joystick Angels project! 

A collection of eight instrumental songs has been produced and arranged for each character within the Joystick Angels story to create a multi-leveled audio/visual experience that pushes the envelope and break boundaries in Indie Comics! 
Producer and Sound Engineer Spenser Sterling
The soundtrack is available in Physical CD and Digital Formats!
Physical CD for Joystick Angels OST
Digital Download for Joystick Angels OST also Available!
Issue one of JOYSTICK ANGELS is 100% drawn and colored. Lettering is taking place as this campaign is running. Here are some samples of the amazing work by artist Nats "Shun" Ledesma and colorist Loris Ravina.
Pages by Nats Ledesma and Loris Ravina
Pages by Nats Ledesma and Loris Ravina
Pages by Nats Ledesma and Loris Ravina
Pages by Nats Ledesma and Loris Ravina
Deep space 2000 years in the future. 
Earth all its majestic glory has been destroyed. Destroyed not by famine, disease or pollution as most scientists predicted but by a world killing, universe destroying empire of parasitic creatures known as the Eukarya. 

With no home, the remaining human populace has fled to the stars and created a vast and powerful space colony called Libor (LEEBOR). 

In an attempt to stop this parasitic evil from spreading across the cosmos, the humans created a resistance effort in the form of a fleet of high powered star fighters. Young pilots man these incredibly powerful space jets to protect the universe at all costs.

Joystick Angels is a story for the ages and new breed of Independent comic! Grab the first heart pounding issue of Joystick Angels and here today! 

Fox - 
FOX
Damien Fox aka FOX - He is the brash and cocky 16 year old leader of the Angels fighter pilot team. At the age of five Fox’s parents were killed in the first galactic war against the Eukarya Empire. Raised by the officials at Libor, Fox made it his life's mission to become a space pilot like his parents before him and fight the evil of the Eukarya. Fox has a serious chip on his shoulder which eventually gets him into trouble but his keen eye and almost prodigy-like understanding of space jets makes him a major asset to the movement.
Fox's space jet
Deuce -  
DEUCE
Lexi Winbush aka DEUCE - Is a 16yr old animal humanoid hybrid creature which they call The Naku. She along with many of her kind spent most of her life in a lab and was created for the sole purpose of assisting Libor space squadrons in extra-planetary exploration by testing out living conditions. This is something that she is not happy with which has caused many issues in her life. The only person that really accepted her for as she was and treated her like a person was Fox. When Fox formed the Angels team she joined as his second in command. Her animalistic side also makes very formidable in battle.
Deuce's space jet
 Dragonetti - 
DRAGONETTI
Andrew Marx aka DRAGONETTI - He is a flamboyant 16 year old black kid who is a lover of music and dance as well as all 80-90’s. He also happens to be the fastest fighter pilot in all of Libor. Just like Fox, Dragonetti’s parents were killed in the first galactic war against the Eukarya. Growing up on the Libor Space Station Dragonetti stayed getting into trouble and eventually met Fox and was swayed by his passion and devotion towards retribution. He eventually joined him and partnered with Fox to create the Joystick Angels team where he serves as Battle officer and strategist.
Dragonetti's space jet
Legz -  
LEGZ
Aisha Garcia aka LEGZ - Is a 14 year old AfroLatina Queer girl who serves the Angels team as lead engineer and tech wiz kid. Legz spends most of her time building robotic sentries, writing AI code and servicing the Angels ships in preparation for battle or space flight. She also has a very hot temper which gets her into trouble. So much trouble that she met Fox in a stockade after they both got caught stealing. From that point on they formed a bond and eventually years later when Fox formed the Angels she joined her friend as one of his right hands.
Legz space jet
Tank - 
TANK
Cassandra Middleton aka TANK - She is a strong and snappy young 15 year old black girl who doubles as espionage agent for the Libor government as well as a member of the Angels team. Besides being one of the best pilots in the galaxy she also is assigned to interplanetary travel and intel collection. She serves the Angels as lead strategist and data analyst. Tank only grew up with her mother as her father died in the first galactic war against the Eukarya. Her love of life is only eclipsed by her love for all things fashion and retro. She is assigned to join the Angels and provide multi level support.
Tanks space jet
For a 1 week only take advantage of the Joystick Angels Memorial Day Tier! 
Get a FREE 6x10 art print, an early copy of Okemus #5 and a early copy of the next Mitt Music album Rapping Diva for only $20! 
SPECIAL MEMORIAL DAY WEEKEND TIER & ADD ON
RAE Comics was created for the sole purpose of publishing unique stories about under-represented characters as well as to create innovative, cool and completely different narratives about Black, POC and Diverse heroes.
Tj Sterling - Founder, Co-creator and Writer Joystick Angels
TJ Sterling is the owner/operator of RAE Comics. He is also the cowriter for the Joystick Angels comic series and the lead writer and artist for the ongoing comic series Okemus. He has also the writer for the Tisena, Okemus Dark History and APG series, all coming soon.

Over the years has created some amazing artwork for Marvel, Dark Horse, Aspen, and more recently DC Comics.
J. Spencer Sterling - Co-creator, co-Writer and Music Supervisor Joystick Angels
J Spencer Sterling is music producer, engineer and emcee that leads a creative and unique record label called MITT MUSIC. A brand that specializes and focuses on Hip Hop, RnB and Pop. Spencer’s first works started out much like you’d expect - with independent, local artists and eventually large scale clients like Universal Music. As a producer/artist Spencer has amassed a catalogue of over 100 songs and 11 personal projects. 

Growing up his favorite comic book characters were Spawn, Silver Surfer, Punisher and the X-Men! It was the uniqueness of an anti-hero, the solace of space; the brutal revenge inflicted on the wicked or the power of collaboration. If it wasn’t music, it was comic books! 
Nats "Shun" Ledesma - Illustrator Joystick Angels
Jonathan L. Ledesma, but in the Art Realm, also known as Shun-008. His work usually falls in the areas of Concept Design,  environments to creatures, armors and weapons... and characters. He learned to through a friend of his who taught him the basics. From there, he started developing his own style upon seeing different art styles from artists in comics. Artists like... Dale Keown, Joe Madureira, Clayton Crain and other artists from the 90's.

Had the opportunity to work as a Layout Artist on some of the leading animation studios here in the Philippines. Companies like Toon City, Filcartoons, Philippine Animation Studio Inc., and Sketzaholiks.
Loris Ravina - Colorist Joystick Angels
Loris Ravina is a cartoonist born in Turin (Italy) in 1994. After studying art at the International School of Comics, he collaborated on various projects as a freelancer.
  He worked as comic book colorist and/or letterer for Oni Press, 133art, SUBSUME Media, RAE Comics, Evoluzione Publishing and Chido Comics.  As character and prop designer for animation, he collaborated in the production of "Berry Bees" and "Francesco", both by Enanimation.

Deron Bennett - Letterer Joystick Angels
Deron Bennett is the owner and lead Letterer for Andworld Design a company that specializes in Lettering and Graphic Design for comics. He has worked for Marvel, DC, Images and many more!

Dr. Shamika Mitchell - Lead Editor at RAE Comics
Dr. Shamika Ann Mitchell is English faculty at Rockland Community College, State University of New York. Her interests are Hip Hop, American literature, comics, popular culture, ethnicity, identity, and subjectivity. She is the creator of #SalaamFandom, an initiative to celebrate and uplift Muslims in all aspects of fandom. Her writing has been published in various texts, including Encyclopedia of Black Comics, Unstable Masks: Whiteness and American Superhero Comics, Black Muslim Reads, and Icons of Hip Hop. She is a member of Women in Comics NYC Collective International.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
While there are risks and challenges involved with any Kickstarter campaign, JOYSTICK ANGELS runs very little risk of hitting any problems. The art is COMPLETE, and the budget has been calculated to cover all costs, including shipping. With one extremely successful Kickstarter campaign under our belt RAE Comics will continue to be a pillar of professionalism within the comics industry since it's inception in 2015. Our customers, fans and friends love us and we love them! We expect that once the campaign closes rewards will be sent out on time or ahead of schedule.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Hey there everyone! Its Spenser Sterling, Lead Producer and Artist at Mitt Music! 

I wanted to personally thank everyone here on KickStarter! The love has been amazing and its hard to put into words how honored and humbled I am! 
To be a part of such an amazing community of nerds, comic and music lovers and people who are new to this. Im happy to share my passion with you! 

Quick update! All the finishing touches are being put on the OST as we speak. I want to make sure everyone enjoys the immersive experience that is JOYSTICK ANGELS!!!!

updates.update_userinfo: VICTORY LAP FOR JOYSTICK ANGELS & VIRTUOUS CON JUNETEENTH
updates.update_content:
Hey gang! The Sterling bros here.

It's a bit challenging to adequately speak on just how grateful we are to every single person who has shared, supported and invested in our Kickstarter this past month!

We are beyond humbled and honored to be able to serve you the reader, the comic lover and all around nerd! As brothers we grew up loving the entertainment comic books gave us. As adults we love it now for a different reason. That reason is YOU!

project_data.project_name: JOYSTICK ANGELS: A NEW YA SPACE OPERA COMIC SERIES

campaign.story:
In a Journey toward creative expression, I found myself, and a story rich with characters, environments, and extraordinary potential.
PLAY

WHY YOU?
because you're you, and you're special, and if you're here, you know it's time that we claim our inner power and unleash our full potential to save humanity.
because you support independent artists that are passionate and creating dope things.
because you know heritage and diversity are extremely important and have been for a long time. You think that literature, comics, and animation are the perfect way to bridge schools of thought, but to do that requires awareness and quality content.
because you believe in the power of intention.
WHY ME?
I grew up LOVING books, and after secretly writing books for years, I decided to self-publish the one series that stuck with me. It was formerly Dragon Wars and has grown into the Lost Children of Andromeda as I have grown into myself.
  Five years ago, (after a long career in marketing), I dedicated the rest of my life to Lost Children of Andromeda and all of the things that could come from it.
  Enter my first novel, Zosma (published November 2018), and my forthcoming novel, 205Z: Time and Salvation (due out May 2021) - Thanks to you!
A large part of my mission is to give voice to the underrepresented, and increase diversity and inclusion in book publishing. I am also creating a book club program where we give disadvantaged youth access to diverse novels and comics to inspire affinity for literature as an experience, thus improving literacy. For the number of books sold through Kickstarter, I will match that number of books being donated to disadvantaged youth. 
NOW INTRODUCING:
THE LOST CHILDREN OF ANDROMEDA
Because I'm passionate about the experience of life, I made Lost Children of Andromeda more than a book series, I made it an immersive experience!! We have art, music, literature, and a fully immersive cinematic podcast and comic book concept in the works. Thanks to an overwhelming amount of love and support, my first book and soundtrack: ZOSMA were already funded. Now I’m here to bring the next experience in the series to life 205Z: Time and Salvation, a Hardcover Novel with images + eBook + Audiobook + a soundtrack.
205Z Time and Salvation follows Allister Adams --
Allister Adams - The Containment Center
-- A young man classified as an “Evolutionary” with inhuman DNA and abilities like strength, regeneration, and energy manipulation, as he searches for his place and his power in a world about to end. Plus a diverse cast of characters like Dr. Florence Belladonna, the high riding political injected to ensure success; Captain Jared Brandt, Evolutionary frontman dedicated to saving humanity; and Lieutenant Leesa Delemar, the strongest living Evolutionary with a terrible secret. 
Dr. Florence Belladonna
Captain Jared Brandt
Lieutenant Leesa Delemar
With only 215 days left until a catastrophic natural event, they’ll go up against the infamous C20 organization in the race for alien artifacts that promise humanity’s salvation. 
C20
THE ASK:
1. With your support today, I can bring a story to life that generations will enjoy for years to come. What your support goes toward is the images in the novel, an animated book trailer for marketing, editing costs, formatting, the audiobook recording, the soundtrack, and the final book cover files. 
2. I'm self-published, so I can't get this novel onto your bookshelf, in your headphones, or to fellow sci-fi fantasy/speculative fiction fans without your support. Word of mouth is essential in an ecosystem that doesn’t trust advertising, and in some cases, media. Trust each other, trust yourselves. Follow your intuition.

THE BACKGROUND:
Alas, the journey continues. Lost Children of Andromeda has become more than I could have ever imagined. It is a beacon for myself, what I continue to pour myself into, and every day I feel myself UNLEASHING more and more of my potential. I am compelled by some power and heritage within, something flowing through me to persevere, to keep going in spite of the obstacles. During 2019 and 2020, a difficult time in all of our lives, where we faced more pain and more loss than ever, I still knew, even as the storm raged around us — We have always been strong enough. It’s from this place that I wrote the novel.
This creative process has been a joyful reflection of my inner journey, and constantly reminds me of the blessings that come with building this platform --  deeply connecting with other creators, book lovers, storytellers, and incredible Evolutionaries.
The community is growing and I want you to be a part of it. 
HERE'S WHAT YOU GET
205Z: Time and Salvation hardcover copy you get by supporting this campaign will never be available again. It will have all of the images and a special hardcover. The great news is, you’re early. Supporting today means you’ll be among the first (calling all early adopters!) You’ll also get the novel before it’s even available to the public.
The rewards are extra special and closely linked to the world. (All designs by the incredible Kieron Anthony Lewis. Artwork by the CMD Studios)
205Z: Time and Salvation Hardcover
205Z: Time and Salvation Hardcover
Poster options

BONUS (SUPPORT SOME OF MY FAVORITE INDIE CREATORS)
THE ALMIGHTY STREET TEAM
The Almighty Street Team: Black Aizan; Blackbird; Dodger; Stalker (and Bear); "The Vigilante With No Name"; Tiger
Zero issue: The Ultimate Urban Vigilante Crossover begins. Six separate heroes gather to take down a murderous, seemingly unstoppable despot and his deadly acolytes.  
Issue 1: The saga continues as this ragtag band of heroes learn more about  the madman terrorizing the city of Bridgeport. This issue focuses more on the mission of Dodger and "The Vigilante With No Name."  
Issue 2: This issue takes us into the mission of the heroes Blackbird and Tiger as the story heats up. Also, Stalker seeks the help of the mysterious hero Black Aizan. 

CNS COMICS - Tol'Asha of the Stars
Tol'Asha of the Stars
Called by the mysterious Voice that Speaks it So, Tol’Asha awakens in Existence to find the powerful Stars awaiting her. They offer her their aid and their power in exchange for her help in banishing the Cosmic Dragons. An epic quest has begun, will you answer the call?

DECIMATION EARTH 
Decimation Earth
Decimation Earth is a timeline jumping, dystopian, steampunk thriller, centered on Gideon Morse, a disgraced super-powered covert operative, as he tries to subvert the evil forces that scheme to awaken The Great Old Ones.
Writer - David Rucker
Co-Writer/Editor - Dan Kim
Artist - Shawn Alleyne
Produced - Evolved Body Art

KONKRET COMICS
Each Konkret title will appeal to different readers. Having diversity and great storytelling as our biggest priorities, and we have focused on writing and producing the highest quality comics in the market right now. If you are a fan of superhero adventures mixed with cosmic science fiction, you will fall in love with Akolyte. Odina is a must-read title for fans of X-Men, ancient Egyptian mythology, and Black culture. Enthusiasts of the supernatural, horror, and crime stories will be attracted to Absolver’s dark storytelling. Those who like complex world-building, Hollywood-level action, and sci-fi franchises like District 9 and Ben 10 will become die-hard fans of Andy Starboy.

CLOSING STATEMENTS
YOUR SUPPORT allows the Lost Children of Andromeda to take flight in a world craving more inspiration and mentorship. This page is for sci-fi fantasy film and TV enthusiasts, speculative fiction literature enthusiasts, comic book and anime enthusiasts, and any young creatives looking to break free and create and live with courage. You have the opportunity to cherish your imaginations, allowing yourself to escape into a new universe full of dynamic characters and rich lore.  

Be sure to follow Lost Children of Andromeda on all channels, I’ll be doing live readings and sharing more details from the Universe!
What are you waiting for? It's time to unleash your potential by picking a reward!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The great news is...I've done this before. But this project comes with some risk. The novel is in a great place in terms of content, there are just a few more things needed to bring it over the finish line. I have all of my partners sourced for formatting, editing, book cover design, and soundtrack composition. I will need to find someone to prin the novels in a really good quality, read the audiobook and a company to support with fulfillment. 

The lead time for fullfilment will be about 12 weeks from the time the Kickstarter ends. The new challenge will be creating some really cool packaging for things getting shipped out and keeping the price down!

Overall, I promise the rewards will be delivered and they will be amazing. Please reach out if you have any questions!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

project_data.project_name: Lost Children of Andromeda an Apocalyptic Sci-Fi Book Series

campaign.story:
The Story
 Dominic Lombardi, aka Dragon Fly, gets sucked into the criminal underworld of Baltimore when he has a chance encounter with a charismatic jazz singer named Cana. Dominic can't help to be smitten when they first meet but soon finds out the club Cana performs at is run by the local mafia that were responsible for the death of his father. The Cusanelli mob has hired a gang of dirt bikers to retrieve and bring them a mysterious metallic box. The bikers shoot up the city streets in the process and to complicate matters further, two special agents from a secret military program are after Dom and the Dragon Fly armor. Dominic has long been anticipating the day he can bring down mob boss Atano Cusanelli and free Baltimore of his criminal empire. Could that time be now or is he unprepared for a battle of this magnitude?
 O.W.L. (Organic Weapons Legion) is a secret military program that was created by DARPA and the Warfighter Performance Department (code 34). O.W.L. Special Agents Reyes & Williams apprehend Dominic for interrogation. They have a special interest in the Dragon Fly armor, but why? How do they know he's Dragon Fly and will they take the armor suit away from him?

Reserve your copy of issue 1 and find out for yourself!
Dragon Fly is a 22 page full color standard sized comic book.
STRETCH GOALS!!!
As we cross the funding amount indicated for each stretch goal reward, ALL BACKERS OF PHYSICAL REWARDS will automatically have that item added to their reward bundle.
 The Creative Team 
Dragon Fly was created by Jay Sloan & Dave Norton
Cover Options
Cover A is the standard cover illustrated by Flavio Rodrigues with colors by Avery Ferdinand.
Cover B is the variant cover illustrated by Stan Yak and also colored by Avery Ferdinand
Cover C is the variant cover illustrated by Elton Thomasi & colored by Avery Ferdinand 
Pin Ups
There are four pinup options in all. Choose one or choose all four!
If you don't already have Transgenesis #1, the comic that marked the first published appearance of Dragon Fly, you can get it in this combo pack along with Dragon Fly #1. Also this reward tier comes with a pin up drawn by Dragon Fly's creator Jay Sloan, as he battles the horde creatures of Transgenesis. Also get a trading card with same art.

Custom Sketch Cards
Get a 2.5"x 3.5" sketch card with a custom illustration by Jay Sloan. Any one character of your choosing. You choose a character and Jay will draw it for you.
T-shirt Rewards
Your choice of Men's, Women's, or Kid's sizes/style on your choice of Green or Lime color T-shirt.
Hoodies!
Baby it's cold outside. Stay warm in style with a Dragon Fly hoodie!
Custom Commissions
Get a single character with minimal background commission on 7"x 10.5 bristol board from Jay Sloan. Any one character of your choosing. You choose a character and Jay will draw a one of kind illustration for you.
 Add-Ons for Backers of Physical Rewards Only
 The Dragon Fly armor is made from a magnesium alloy, making it lightweight and nearly indestructible. The armor has retractable blades in the forearms and lower legs for any up close and personal fighting. It also contains flame throwers in the forearm bracers. The suit’s head piece contains advanced optical lenses allowing vision in several different light spectrum and the jet pack on his back allows him flight capabilities.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
50% of this project has been self financed, we just need a little help getting the rest of the book completed and printed. Where the money we raise from this Kickstarter will go to is artwork for remainder of book (40%), printing of the comic books (25%), production costs of the other rewards (10%), packaging & shipping of rewards (15%), and Kickstarter fees & taxes (8-10%).

All of the costs for paying the creators contributing to this project has been self financed to this point and the comic is 50% completed. However there are still some risks involved, as life can throw you unexpected curves. We have back up plans if any creator should experience difficulty finishing their part of the project.

Turn around on the printed comic and it's timely delivery to us is the biggest challenge. Fortunately we've been a part of 7 previous Kickstarters and know which printers we can go to for quality printed comics and reliable delivery times. If for any reason there are delays, we will still deliver the products our backers pledge for.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content: Hello and happy Memorial Day weekend. I think most of you are probably like me and really needed a three day weekend. So physical rewards started shipping out this past week. If your package has shipped already you should've received an email with your tracking number. I've been sending them out in waves, with the final stack getting labels printed this weekend and going to the post office Tuesday morning. I think this may have been the single most physical rewards for a Kickstarter since we started Unparalleled so thank you for that. Although Operation Eclipse #3 is on pace to outdo that number already. Also the rewards for Indiegogo backers went out this weekend.

Big first day for Operation Eclipse #3, 56% funded and we have hit the 50 backer mark.  That means everyone who physically backed the comic will get the Eclipse chibi sticker.
If you're thinking of coming back, today is the day!
Click the link to take you there.  We have 2 stretch goals for day 1 and we will have more once the campaign is fully funded.

Hey hope your having a great weekend. It's been a little longer than originally expected but we're getting close to having the book's lettering completed. Our letterer had some unexpected delays to starting on our book, sometimes life happens, but he is well on track to finishing up. Only 8 more pages remain for letters then we will send out digital rewards and send this book to print. We still expect to make the May delivery for physical rewards. We have everything except the printed books ready to ship.

updates.update_userinfo: News & Updates for 1st Week of April

updates.update_content: Hey, while the pages of Dragon Fly are getting lettered by Francisco we are gearing up for another Kickstarter campaign. This one is for our sci fi fantasy adventure series called Stellar Odyssey. Issue 3 launches on Tuesday April 13 but you can sign up to the pre-launch page now for a notification reminder of when we go live. This is another story that I've created almost all of the characters for, created the story concept and then brought in Brian Hawkins to script it. Elton Thomasi (Aftershock, Titan, Darkhorse) is also back as the illustrator and has already completed all 22 pages of sequential art for this issue. If you don't know Elton, he is the regular artist for Aftershock's Animosity comic series and his page art for this book is absolutely gorgeous!

project_data.project_name: Dragon Fly: Realizing Who You Are (part 1)

campaign.story:
The Kison Askari are a group of mutant miners with stone-like skin who are tired of not being compensated properly while working to gather precious materials on other planets in the Milky Way. The GMC(Galactic Marine Corps) are sent in to quell a galaxy wide revolt. The mutated races also learn of an ancient being who may in fact be manipulating most of the conflicts that have been happening since before the world wars!
Graphic novel series based on the scifi series! Space opera, first contact, military scifi fans unite!
This is for the physical copy of the Ancient Illumination graphic novel volume one : Remembrance and Revolt written by Rod Van Blake, illustrated by Jordan P. Jackson, a special edition challenge coin for the GMC recon unit stationed on Saturn in the novels, and a special edition print featuring characters from the novels also illustrated by Jordan P. Jackson. This will help us ensure that volume 2 will be produced immediately and ensure the growth of this series. This is a 56 page full color graphic novel issue with a couple character concepts included in the back.




Like many of the creators on this platform, we are independent! If you like indie creators, we fit the bill. Do you like science fiction, space opera, action scifi stories with a diverse cast of colorful characters? Then this is definitely the graphic novel project for you! Help us expand these stories to ensure that they continue to grow and thrive!
Character print of the exiled ancient being of light who becomes the original Pharaoh for our recruit backers.
For our Veteran level backers we have this 9X12 history scene depicting the exiled being of light as he influences various societies throughout history.
For all you salty dogs out there this tier has the physical edition of the graphic novel!
At The GMC Recon tier you get the graphic novel plus a limited edition challenge coin for the elite Marine unit stationed on Saturn!
For our Senior enlisted backers we have all three of the literary novels in paperback plus the graphic novel. That's Ancient Illumination, Ancient Illumination II: Kuongoza Mwanga the Leading light, Ancient Illumination III: Godhood, and the Ancient Illumination volume 1: Remembrance and Revolt!
For the Officer tier we replace the paperback versions of the novels with the hard covers!
For the people who back this project at the Commandant level, you get everything and then some! All three novels, volume 1 of the graphic novel, the limited edition coin, both the character print and the history scene print plus a limited edition metal print of the poster in 11X14 of the banner image for the graphic novel series featured just below the video on the top of this page! More updates coming soon as the coins and cases have just arrived!

For my exiled beings of light your likeness goes here, custom designed to be whatever faction from the Ancient Illumination you choose! Enlist in the Galactic Marine Corps, fight along side the Kison Askari, scheme with the Limbia Johari or beguile and assassinate with the Jade assassins. It's up to you and this will be a rare limited edition! Remember you can only get the physical versions of this graphic novel through this Kickstarter right now!






Cancer is a silent killer that does not care what you look like or where you come from, and it’s especially disturbing when it gets it claws on children. Help us fight this disease by getting us to the 8K mark in funding. Which ever reward tier you go for will get us that much closer and it will be much appreciated by us and surely the kid this nominal donation helps in their battle for life will appreciated that much more.
This was me a couple decades ago. I was lucky enough to get out of my enlistment in the United States Marines relatively unscathed. Not everyone that makes a commitment like this does. We would like to give back and help those that were injured or otherwise adversely affected during their service to this country. Personally, I could not make a donation this size by myself mainly because of the present conditions, but through you all backing this project and getting us to this level of funding, together we can make a contribution hopefully helping a service member who needs it.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Budgeting may be a challenge as we want to get enough copies produced to fulfill all of our rewards and have some left over. Cancelled cons have hindered our ability to get these to the public. We need support in order to gain momentum for the second installment.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: The Hard Charger

support.title: GMC Recon
support.descp: signed copy of volume one plus a limited edition challenge coin for the GMC recon unit stationed on Saturn. This coin is 1.75" died on both side with a copper base metal for better weight. All my prior service military vets should know what a challenge coin is! This coin is for the fictitious Recon unit of the Galactic Marine Corps featuring a special Marine Corps Insignia with Saturn instead of Earth and a deaths head cross rifle insignia with the phrase "Train in the Purple Haze". As part of my what if scenario I imagined that instead of having a blue sky on Saturn what if the prisms caused by sunlight coming through dust particles in the air turned the sky purple there? Not based in reality as I have never been there but thought that would be fun!

support.title: Commandant

support.title: Exiled being of light!
support.descp: The beings of light can control their bodies on a molecular level! This is for the chance to be on an exclusive alternate cover of the graphic novel with your choice of how you want to be depicted! You can be a Kison Askari, Limbia Johari, GMC regular or even a Jade assassin! There will only be ten of these made ever, never to be reprinted.

updates.update_content: Still waiting on the last batch of metal prints, book 2 in paperback and the copies of the graphic novel. Hard covers and variant cover of the graphic novel have arrived! As soon as the remaining rewards get here we will begin to ship!! Need more addresses!!!

updates.update_userinfo: VOLUME 2. BEGINS! Interior Pages are coming along!
updates.update_content: Thank you all once again! Digital backers be sure to check your emails for the Google link to the PDF of Ancient Illumination volume 1 graphic novel! Backers for the physical reward tiers we are still waiting for around half of you to fill out those surveys!

We really need you guys to fill out those surveys so we can get to shipping your rewards the moment everything is printed and gets to us! Only half or our physical backers have filled them out. Help us, help you! lol

Thank you all again so very much! Surveys have been sent out to all tiers to confirm or change addresses and to specify the name you as backers would like displayed on the "thank you" page or verification if you would like to be excluded. Jordan and I will be conferring soon to figure out how to best send digital PDF's out, and will be shipping out the physical rewards some time next month. Enjoy the holiday season if you partake! If not find time to enjoy family either in your home or from a distance. Stay safe out there!

We are really humbled and grateful by the support shown to this project. It truly amazing given the time in which we were able to do this, and we are eternally thankful. Be sure to keep an eye out for notifications about our progress. There will soon be surveys sent out as soon as payment is finalized asking you to confirm or change your address for those of you receiving physical rewards for us to ship AND, wanted to let you all know there will be a thank you page in the Kickstarter version so we will also be needing the name you prefer to be recognized with on that page or to be excluded for whatever reason. (not judging) Once again from the bottom of our hearts, thank you. Without you all, this day may not have come.

Thank all of you wonderful backers for your support, your shares on various social media platforms, love and enthusiasm for this project which is near and dear to our hearts! 3 day to try and get to those stretch goals! Perhaps an unofficial stretch goal could be at the 7K mark where all backers would get an exclusive pic of the writer Rod Van Blake cosplaying as Jared Omega, King of the Kison Askari. Pretty sure that may require a head and beard shave though...Let's go!

campaign.story:
Konkret Comics has returned to Kickstarter, bringing you all the stories that you love! Akolyte, Odina and Absolver are back with their highly anticipated issue 2's, new installments of their epic series. But, as you know, Konkret Comics is always bringing new additions to our ever-growing Universe, and this year is no different. We will also be introducing the world to Andy Starboy, a brand new series from the multi-talented creator and writer, Daniel D. Calvo! This Kickstarter is full of EXCLUSIVE content that will ONLY be available to our backers, including covers by the great Eder Messias. With a new campaign full of exclusive content, covers, posters and t-shirts, we are here to set the bar high and Keep it Konkret!!!
 
 Each Konkret title will appeal to different readers. Having diversity and great storytelling as our biggest priorities, we have focused on writing and producing the highest quality comics in the market right now. If you are a fan of super hero adventures mixed with cosmic science fiction, you will fall in love with Akolyte. Odina is a must-read title for fans of X-Men, ancient Egyptian mythology and Black culture. Enthusiasts of the supernatural, horror and crime stories will be attracted to Absolver’s dark storytelling. Those who like complex world building, Hollywood-level action and sci-fi franchises like District 9 and Ben 10 will become die-hard fans of Andy Starboy.
Being a group of multi-cultured artists, creators and writers, Konkret Comics is here to show our diverse culture under a positive light and build a platform for voices of color to be heard, creating characters and stories for the old and new generations of readers to feel represented by.
 Akolyte #2: A few years after learning about his cosmic powers, Akolyte returns to Earth as its greatest hero. However, his mere presence has awakened many enemies, ranging from the criminal underground, the government, and a mysterious menace from outer space! The time has come for Akolyte to show the world who he truly is. Will the hero of Sapphire City fold under pressure, or will he rise to the occasion as the world's brightest light?
  Akolyte #2 Legacy
 Odina #2: Odina, a superheroine who abandoned the world of crime-fighting, finds herself back in action in the midst of a battle between Gods and super human Hybrids. Odina must track down a demi-goddess on the loose and stop her before she finds a group of mystical items that will unleash hell on Earth.
  Odina #2 " Omni Strike"
 Absolver #2: Absolver has only one purpose: Hunting for those who need vindication. However, his commitment to his mission is put to the test when he ends up questioning the lack of acknowledgment for his efforts. Does the Hunter need acceptance? Meanwhile, we find out that you don’t get to return to the living and hunt them down without putting a target on your back!
  Absolver #2 " Before I Wake"
 Andy Starboy #1: Andy Starboy is the greatest hero of a world where Roswell, New Mexico has been the crashing site of several alien ships, advancing technology immensely and creating a new race of mutants who are constantly discriminated against. When a new villain shows up at his school, will Andy be able to defeat him, and deal with the consequences of their battle? It takes a Nu-Breed of Hero to change the world.
  Andy Starboy #2 "A Nu-Breed of Hero
 THE MERCH
KickStarter Exclusive T-shirt
Absolver (Character Tee)
Odina Character Tee
Andy Starboy ( Character Tee)
Akolyte (Character Tee)
 Derek Allen - Creator/Writer/Letterer (Akolyte)
  Derek " Lonzo Starr" Allen
Born in Philadelphia, Derek had no lack of inspiration growing up. Starting at home with his parents, who encouraged his imagination to flourish, he was also able to look at iconic Philly personalities for encouragement. As a creator and CEO of Konkret Comics, he has always thought that good storytelling never goes out of style. With Akolyte, he hopes to inspire any little girl or boy that dreams of doing something extraordinary. In 2020, Akolyte Issue 1 was nominated to 5 Glyph Awards, including best writer and best male character.
 Onaji Rouse- Creator/Writer (Odina)
  Onaji Rouse
Hailing from the Mecca of African-American entertainment, Atlanta, GA, Onaji has always wanted to create worlds and stories for his people. He credits both Stan Lee and Dwayne McDuffie for paving the way for him. Jim Lee’s iconic run on X-Men also had a heavy influence on his style and desire to write comics. Odina embodies the strength in all of us and the willingness to work through the difficult times in our past in order to make a difference in the future. In 2020, he was nominated for 2 Glyph Awards for best writer and rising star, due to his work on Odina issue 1.
Jermael Lessey- Creator/Writer (Absolver)
Jermael Lessey
Jermael was able to cultivate multiple sources of inspiration, having been born in Trinidad and Tobago and raised in both New York and Florida. Christopher Reeve’s Superman and 1989’s Batman film ignited the fire within him, but Spawn set it ablaze. Through Absolver, Jermael wants to create a space where African-Americans can experience a mythos that represents them. Taking inspiration from real-life events, the comic acts as a reflection of the Black experience in America, dealing with themes like corruption, violence and pain.

 Daniel D. Calvo- Creator/Writer (Andy Starboy)
  Daniel D. Calvo
Daniel is a Cuban writer, editor, translator and comics journalist currently based in Pennsylvania. He was a published author since he was 13, having his work appear in numerous anthologies, magazines and literary websites. He is the Editor-in-Chief of Konkret Comics, and his goal in life is to prove that no matter where you come from, you can reach new heights and become the best version of yourself. With Andy Starboy, he wants to make his readers reflect on human nature and violence through the lens of science fiction.

Production Team
Bruno Lima - Akolyte #2 (Line Artist)
Leandro Meneses - Andy StarBoy #1, Odina #2 (Line artist)
Matheus Huve - Akolyte#2, Andy Starboy #1, Odina #2 (Colorist)
 Lonzo Starr - Akolyte #2, Andy Starboy #1 (Letterer) 
 Daniel D Calvo - Akolyte #2, Andy Starboy #1, Odina #2 (Editor) 
Gaurav Shivastav - Absolver #2 (Line Artist)
 Aljosa Tomic - Absolver #2 (Colorist)
  Kickstarter Production Team
Destiny Jones (Head Administrator)
Daniel D Calvo (Lead Editor/Editor & Chief)
Jahvon Ross (Head of Video Production)
Vince White ( Lead Graphic Designer)
Jermael Lessey ( Project Coordinator)
Onaji Rouse (Marketing Manager/PR)
 Derek Allen (Creative Director/Director of Operations) 

Since the last time we spoke.
With our explosive introduction in 2019, Konkret Comics went on an amazing adventure. After a highly successful Kickstarter campaign (yes, we’ve done this before!), several appearances at comic conventions like Black Label Comic Con and Nerdtino Expo to name a few, we had the pleasure of hosting our very own book signing event at the legendary Amalgam Comics in Philadelphia. Konkret Comics was also nominated for an astonishing total of 7 Glyph Awards, including best writer, best rising star and best artist for the first issues of Akolyte and Odina.
PLAY

Book Signing at Amalgam Comics, February 29th, 2020 in Philadelphia, Pa
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Konkret Comics is committed to excellence and high-quality storytelling. This campaign is a pre-order platform. All the art, lettering and formatting of the comics is COMPLETED! Never mind what, we will deliver these books to our supporters. This campaign is an effort from the company to cut down production and shipping costs. Depending on your location, shipping may vary and cause slight delays. However, we will make sure to update you at all times on the progress of your reward. Thanks again for your support, and remember always, Keep it Konkret!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
We've reached out third stretch goal of $27,000!!! Thank you Monster Fans!! That means everyone who has backed at a physical reward tier will get a bonus comic book added to their reward tier. I'm excited to be able to add an additional book for readers to hold in their hands and dig into the Crescent City Monsters world.
Crescent City Monsters starts in 1963 with Jonas Atelus, a sorcerer who is deeply seated in the New Orleans supernatural world. Unknown to Jonas, a mysterious being puts a bounty on his head. Jonas is also an aspiring blues musician and on the night of his band's first paying gig, the monsters of Crescent City attack Jonas to collect the bounty. 
POST CHAPTER ONE SPOILERS: 
The events of that night change Jonas's life dramatically. He loses his powers and wakes up decades later in a new body and his memory fades in and out. With the unwittingly help of powerful teenage Creole Magic sorcerers, Jonas escapes from the outer-dimensional prison he was trapped in. His escape is just the beginning of this nightmare of a journey he's thrown into. 
Although Jonas escapes his outer-dimensional prison, there are other supernatural forces that see his existence as a threat and they plan to eliminate that threat.
Chapter four continues to dig deeper into the dark world of Crescent City Monsters and its characters. The story also explores how Jonas deals with having everything taken away from him while trying to figure out why a bounty was put on is head.
Check out more previews pages:
THE BOOKS
We're half way through completing issue four and part of the Kickstarter funds will be used to pay artist Gian Carlo Bernal to complete issue four.
This Kickstarter campaign will also help fund the printing of BOTH the trade and hardcover that collects issues 1-4 AND for individual copies of issue #4! So, if you already have issues 1-3 and want only issue 4, we've got you. 
The hardcover and trade will be 100+ pages of amazing black and white art and story with quality gloss paper that will make the artwork pop. The plan is to make the hardcover slightly larger than the trade so you can enjoy a closer look at Gian Carlo's amazing artwork.
Creator's Edition (PDF)
Included in all tiers will also be a bonus Creator's Edition PDF. This PDF will contain the line artwork and script for issue #1.
$16K:  DayBlack & Crescent City Monsters 
We're collaborating with Keef Cross, the creator of DayBlack, on a crossover with Crescent City Monsters. The first stretch goal will be a PDF of a 10-12 page crossover comic book drawn by Keef Cross added to every reward tier if we reach $16K. We're excited about this collaboration because of the incredible synergy between DayBlack and Crescent City Monsters. The story will take place before chapter one of Crescent City Monsters circa 1962, so we'll dig more into Crescent City Monster's main character, Jonas, and his life before the bounty was put on his head. For those of you who are new to DayBlack you'll be introduced to the main character, Merce, a former slave who was bitten by a vampire in the cotton fields. Four hundred years later, he works as a tattoo artist in the small town of DayBlack. Check out dayblackcomic.com for more of  Merce's story. 
Artist Gian Carlo Bernal and writer Newton Lilavois recently won the 2020 Glyph Comic Awards for BEST ARTIST, BEST WRITER, BEST COVER, and FAN AWARD FOR BEST WORK for their comic book series Crescent City Monsters.
WHY DID I CREATE THIS STORY? 
As a Haitian-American I wanted to introduce the rich Haitian Voodoo lore to comic books readers through more authentic lens. Mix that with my love for dark gritty stories and the urge to create a zombie story, and you have the delicious gumbo called Crescent City Monsters.
What are the fans saying?
"Great beginning and refreshing comic that has a great story to tell. The story placement is awesome and gives off a true world experience to the characters also great art as well." - Terrance S.
"One of the best comic books I have read in years. I purchase 500 plus comics per year, and this one is by far my favorite of 2020. The story has me completely hooked and anxious for more. The art work is phenomenal ."- James J.
"An amazing original tale! I've always been into supernatural comics like Blade, Midnight Sons, Ghost Rider, Doctor Strange, Man-Thing, and Crescent City Monsters takes it to a sophisticated level!" - Jesus S.
"Absolutely love the story line and the illustrations are definitely amazing! Would love to see the comics in color. Great job overall hope to see more soon. :)" - Tiesha S.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As with every Kickstarter there are risks involved in fulfilling the rewards. Chapter four of Crescent City Monsters is currently only half way through so there's always the risk of project delays due to book production. Based on our past Kickstarter history, the risk of production delays is small. Gian and I have been working together for the last three years and we are experienced in meeting our Kickstarter deadlines. With our previous three Kickstarters, we've always either delivered early or on time.

We've taken into consideration things like post office delays. But given the current government situation with the post office there may be delays that are out of our control. We'll always do our best to keep you informed of our progress and any delays.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Hey Yall!

My amazing and talented friends are running a very cool campaign that I think you will enjoy! Check it out:

campaign.story:
This campaign is funding the fourth issue of OKEMUS, an ongoing mini-series written, drawn and published by T.J. Sterling of RAE Comics, colored by Balram Banerjee, and lettered by Deron Bennett of Andworld Design. This will be a full color, 32-page comic book with some very cool Variant Covers!
The purpose of campaign and our mission is to help put this entertaining and unique flagship comic series Okemus into the hands of people all over the world and continue to celebrate positive and uplifting black stories in comics.
It is also our prime mission to bring many more of our creative projects to life with the help of the Kickstarter community and more.
Alternate Cover Wraparound art for OKEMUS issue 4
OKEMUS is a sci-fi manga sentai-esk action epic about a young man named Cale who unknowingly possesses a latent super-human ability that could potentially save the human race. Enter the Okemus Hunters four villainous bio-mechanical warriors who have traveled from a dark desolate future to our modern day time period to acquire this ability and use for there own evil purposes. 
As the Hunters get closer to Cale this latent super-human ability begins to AWAKEN. 
Unbeknownst to this young man is the path that awaits him where the key to the salvation of two worlds could solely lean on his shoulders! 
Issue 4 of this 6 part comic series (offered in this Kickstarter) is 32 pages. Also available is Issue 0, 1, 2, 3. Get the whole story so far!
Cale & The Okemus Hunters
I created OKEMUS for ALL the fans of big budget action, time travel and sci-fi stories. Although OKEMUS is safe and fun for all ages we suggest readers that are 10 and up read this story due to the high powered action and fight scenes. (No different than Dragon Ball Z, Power Rangers and or Xmen).
Similar to Dragon Ball Z, Super Sentai and X-men, Okemus plays with various archetypes, themes, concepts of spirituality and non-linear storytelling to craft an epic tale that has very unique characters and situations. 
But if you dig deeper, all these elements speak to a much deeper meaning...within all of us there is greatness and it's up to us to explore that greatness fully and live our dreams.  
Page 2 from Okemus Issue #4
Issue Four of OKEMUS is 100% drawn and inked, and colored. Lettering is taking place as this campaign is running. Here are some samples of the amazing work by CEO and Artist TJ Sterling and colorist Balram Banerjee. 
Page 8 from OKEMUS issue #4
Page 11 from OKEMUS issue #4
Page 12 from OKEMUS issue #4
Earth. 2000 years in the future. 80 percent of the worlds resources have been diminished.  Animal life ceases to exist. Radiation and extreme forces of nature make the surface inhabitable for extended periods of time. War has taken it's toll. To make matters worse the world has become overrun with bio-mechanical monsters called Mechai. The Human race struggles to survive as their numbers dwindle day by day.
At one point in History there was a lone warrior who stood against the Mechai and kept them at bay, giving humanity a fighting chance. After the mysterious disappearance of this lone warrior the world was left without a protector. 
The Okemus Hunters - Mesar, Tisena, Sahta, Bain
In an attempt to recreate their missing hero a rogue science division genetically experiments on four military operatives giving them extraordinary abilities. These four warriors would become known as the Okemus Hunters. Their mission is to annihilate the Mechai by traveling through time and stopping them before they even began and finding the source of the genetic anomaly.
Rewind to the year 2015. After the four Hunters arrive in the past and begin their mission they stumble upon what they seem to be looking for. A young man genetics student at Purdue University named Cale. Drama, action, twists and turns ensue. How can one normal young man be at the center of all this fantastical story?! 
Cale: Meet your Destiny
Grab ALL Five issues to find out! One things for sure OKEMUS keeps you guessing, thinking and entertained from start to finish.   
 Sneak Peak of our 8-bit Video Game Test!  
PLAY

Company Mission Statement:
RAE Comics was created for the sole purpose of publishing unique stories about under-represented characters as well as to create innovative, cool and completely different narratives about Black, POC and Diverse heroes.  
TJ Sterling - Owner, Writer and Lead Artist of RAE Comics
TJ Sterling is the creator, writer and artist of the OKEMUS series. He has created artwork for Marvel, Dark Horse, Aspen, and recently DC Comics.
Krishna and Balram Banerjee aka The Xong Bros - Interior Colors and Alternate Cover
The Xong Bros are prolific illustrators and color artists of comics, graphic novels, character design and animation.
Deron Bennett - Andworld Design
Deron Bennett is the owner and lead Letterer for Andworld Design a company that specializes in Lettering and Graphic Design for comics. He has worked for Marvel, DC, Images and many more!
Tavvon Reynolds - RAE Comics Exclusive Toy Designer
Tavvon Reynolds, a.k.a. The 3D Hero is a 3D artist and toy designer specializing in Sculpting, Painting both traditional and digital. All toys are hand-sculpted and custom painted.
Sonia Harris - Logo Designer for RAE Comics
Conceived in New York, born in London and living in Los Angeles, Sonia Harris has been designing logos, books (including prose, art, and comic books), websites, posters, infographics, flyers, and advertising campaigns since 1998. She brings her talent to RAE Comics as it's lead Logo artist.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
While there are risks and challenges involved with any Kickstarter campaign, OKEMUS runs very little risk of hitting any problems. The art is COMPLETE, and the budget has been calculated to cover all costs, including shipping. Although this is our very first campaign RAE Comics is and has been a pillar of professionalism within the comics industry since 2015. Our customers, fans and friends love us and we love them! We expect that once the campaign closes rewards will be sent out on time or ahead of schedule.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
PLAY

 VT HEROES, is a fighting card game that is inspired by tokusatsu, sentai, and traditional arcade fighting games. What is tokusatsu and sentai? Think Power Rangers,  and the like. The thing that makes VT HEROES visually stand out of the crowd is the fact that within the sentai and tokusatsu genre, it eliminates the idea of body standards by having some of the fighters as slender, or plus sized.  You also see cool thing such as the assigned VT colors, Red, Green, and Black  (mostly dominated by male figures) are female figures. The Pink one is usually associated with female characters, are now (in VT Heroes) associated with super muscular males!
Two players create their fighter using 3 Stat cards based on their Hero, Element, and Totem abilities. Once they do that they gather their 40 Action cards and battle in a rock-paper-scissors style fight using moves that fit within the 4 categories, Attack, Defense, Power, and Intelligence. VT HEROES is super easy to learn, but complex enough to keep fans of fighting games more than satisfied. 
 So far the CLAIMED VT HEROES are:
TIER LEVELS: 5, 6, & 7 ($150 +) will get a FREE COPY of what will be titled, “VT Heroes Series 1.1” when it is finished in the future. Don’t worry you still will get Series 1.0 first in time. This also goes for the LIVE ACTION SET “VT Heroes Series 1.2”!!

updates.update_userinfo: VT Heroes: ‘How To Play’ video is on YouTube!
updates.update_content:
The How To Play video is up! Please LIKE and SUBSCRIBE to J1 Studios on YouTube. https://youtu.be/1k-HoYPbje0
It seems as though the delay (thanks to the pandemic) has brought the estimated shipping date to the first couple of weeks in January.
Follow the VT Heroes Instagram. I do random IG Live videos where you can hang out with me while I do live drawings and more.

After getting some advise during Thanksgiving (thanks @lol_its_lucas_ ), I decided to alter the layout a bit to make it more symmetrical! That means the play mats that people from the Kickstarter are getting will be discontinued, and thus exclusive!
What do you think?
Art by @tito_habif
⚡️⚡️⚡️⚡️⚡️⚡️⚡️⚡️⚡️⚡️⚡️ WATCH THE VIDEO: https://www.instagram.com/tv/CIf3Al6DV4G/?igshid=1uj8305s4oh9v

Online the printing company started off saying that the game would be shipped sometime in late November - early December. Unfortunately due to the pandemic the printing company was not considered an essential business, so they weren’t allow to be open during the crisis. With all that said, the delays are now pushed to mid December - early January.
I’m checking every day on the statuses of the various orders.

Than you to everyone who helped back this project. All of the artist, advisors and backers. We could not have done this without each of you.

campaign.story:
8/28: Stretch Goal Added! See below.
*Please note U.S. shipping is included in the pledge amount. If you pledge $25, you're going to get the reward for $25 -- no surprises. 

Can damnation turn into redemption? Can revenge turn into salvation? For fans of both horror and intellectual stories with a heart, I present Worms Crawl In. It is a 160-page black & white original graphic novel.
Homeless spirit medium Delane exists in a jaded world but, when her only friend is murdered, she hits rock bottom. Marco is a ghost trapped in a rotting corpse craving revenge against the same person that killed Delane’s friend. Together, they embark on a quest for blood that metamorphizes into a journey of self-discovery and redemption. They find virtue in freeing souls damned to roam the earth even as a sinister power intends to keep the souls bound forever. 
What makes it different? This is NOT a “zombie book.” There is NO apocalypse. This is a macabre character driven tale in which one of the main protagonists, Marco, is trapped within a living dead corpse looking for redemption. Borrowing liberally from established myths and paranormal pseudo-science, this supernatural thriller with  heart pits existentialism and the depths of friendship against ghosts and hungry cadavers. It teases modern paranormal culture in its references, such as ghost hunting, demonic possession, Bigfoot, and cannibal murderers.  
This book targets a mature audience (17+ for language, violence, gore) who loves The Crow, Swamp Thing, and Redlands. 
I love sequential art story-telling. In middle school, I made stories with my friends on printer paper and tried to sell it at the local comics shop. I flunked a class in high school because I doodled more than I studied.  I went to a University and got a degree in illustration. I've partnered with many talented fellow creators in small press and independent publishing. But, for the past five years I decided to walk this path alone and bring my own story to life.
I spent the first two years just learning how to write in a structured way, and rewriting version after version until I had a compelling story. The next three years I would draw, and draw, and ink, and hate my work and re-do pages, and continue to draw and ink. Then, teach myself to letter. Draw and ink some more. Repeat, again...  Feeling as if it would never be done. Discouraged. Invigorated. Obsessed.  
Leonardo da Vinci is attributed with the saying  "art is never finished, only abandoned." So, I humbly abandon this epic 160-page journey of mine to you.
Preview  
What is this for?
My fellow creators know it takes a lot to produce a book. Human effort and time aside, it's bushels of art supplies, website hosting and domains, ISBNs, proofs, print production, packaging and postage, marketing materials, and all the other crud that's not creative but has to happen to get a product out.  

Since the funding goal has been achieved...
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Risks?! It's done. From cover to cover this book is completed. Risks include:
* Computer and back-up drive murder suicide pact
* I never figure out my printer's file formatting requirements
* Personalized lightening strike
* Actual zombie apocalypse or other unforeseen acts of nature
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: King Among Kings
support.descp: Your pockets run deep and you need no reward for your selfless generosity. Seeing people smile is reward enough.

support.title: Worms Crawl In soft cover book, signed
support.descp: You get an advanced reader's copy before it hits stores! I will personally sign each copy on the inside front cover. It will have no UPC or ISBN, forever distinguishing itself from all future releases.

support.title: Original art, and signed book
support.descp: Not only do you get the signed ARC book above, you also get one randomly selected ORIGINAL ART PAGE from the book. Now, this is not some blue lined special cut 11x17 hoity-toity slick collectors item. This book was made with the tools of the hard working man. It's on Strathmore brisol board ruled by me, possibly with penciled notes in the margins, inking mistakes, stains, knicks, white out tape, etc. This is old school. Welcome to my world and have a piece of my beautiful pain.

updates.update_content:
My Last Update on Kickstarter!
A final huge thank you for your support! I have my online shop set up at wormscrawlin.com where the final retail book is selling. I'll be posting other items for sale there like sketches or other merch related to Worms Crawl In (suggestions welcome).  
The book will be available at select comics shops in eastern PA.  Stores list will be updated on the website.

All the rewards & books have been mailed.  If you have not received it send me a note so I can track it. 
Join me at the Worms Crawl In facebook page for updates about the book or if you just want to leave a message.  Reviews/comments are welcome. :D   Thank you for your support!!! 
https://www.facebook.com/Worms-Crawl-In-108933127544411
http://www.wormscrawlin.com/
I've started mailing out rewards.   I'm hoping to get them all into the USPS system by Monday.

updates.update_userinfo: I love it when a plan comes together!
updates.update_content: A famous historical figure known for overcoming impossible odds, Colonel John "Hannibal" Smith, once said, "I love it when a plan comes together."  I've got the books signed and bagged. I've got the stretch goal door hangers.  I have the Gemini mailers. For those who pledged for art I've got it packaged and ready for priority mail.  I know what I'm doing all next week.  Perfect timing for Halloween reading.  I know what you mean, Hannibal.

Sort of in a holding pattern for the moment impatiently waiting for the Kickstarter funds to transfer so I can fulfill the rewards and ship. The book is processing with the printer and should be done any day now. Any. Day.  Soooo...

Thank you to all!!!! With the successful completion of this Kickstarter project I am finishing configurations of my online store. ISBNs and UPCs are being acquired, the retail copy of Worms Crawl In is in final design (different than the A.R.C. in this Kickstarter), and printer is lined up. Worms Crawl In's bills will be paid. And, perhaps too optimistically, I'm looking forward to preparations for 2021 comic book 'cons and other conventions.
In the immediate: YOUR REWARDS!  I've already placed my A.R.C. book order with the printer.  I have all the materials I need to ship the books and have confirmed my postage rate with USPS.  Kickstarter will be collecting your pledges in the following days/weeks and I will be sending you a survey to get your shipping address.

updates.update_userinfo: "Home is behind, the world ahead, And there are many paths to tread" - J. R. R. Tolkien
updates.update_content:
Thanks to all of you who pledged, even $1, to fuel my journey to the world ahead. Worms Crawl In is my first major creative project, and not my last. This Kickstarter, which has outperformed my expectations, is giving me the fire to push Worms Crawl In down as many paths as it will possibly go, and given me the freedom to make MORE stories!  That's right - I have more in my cobwebby dimly lit brain.  And with only hours left before this path ends I am already eagerly anticipating those new many paths to tread.   
Thank you for your contribution, but more so for your confidence in my book.

updates.update_userinfo: Podcast Interview! Nerds From The Crypt
updates.update_content: Super excited!!   For anyone who likes horror podcasts check out Nerds From The Crypt. In this episode I talk to them about Stephen King' Creepshow, The  Crow, and my own book. "Dan Schmidt joins me today to talk about his ongoing Kickstarter campaign, “Worms Crawl In“. Dan talks about his process and inspiration to get his idea out to the public."  https://nerdsftc.com/worms-crawl-in/

Got my super durable book mailers in.  Each copy of Worms Crawl In will be protected in this rigid high quality corrugated board mailer to withstand rough handling during shipment.  Sooo ready to ship these out! Anyone following who hasn't pledged; what are you waiting for?!  Book is ready, mailers are in.  If we get to 65 you get a great read and a sassy door hanger, too!

campaign.story:
Parker 2 cover
 COLORING BOOK UNLOCKED for 18K 
Art by Nate Lovett
First look at the upcoming Limited Edition, Parker Reef Statue. This statue will be full color and in the same pose as the cover. Only 100 will be made. 
A look at the stickers we unlocked at 16K! For all Backers!! 
June 30th. Parker Reef warm up before pages. 
The kid
A Page from Parker 2 (limited pencil edition)
With the funds raised for Adventures part 2,we will not only make the best book we can, but  we will also continue our work with Taninasreef.org, a non profit started last year that helps children and families in need. We have used funds so far for toy drives, baby shower gifts and much more. A portion of this Kickstarter will go directly toward the non profit. 
Adventures part 1 started as a book to somehow wrap my head around the loss of my girlfriend Tana and our newborn son, Parker Reef, on March 14, 2018. What it turned into, however, was a book that meant so much to so many. I never really knew what this book would mean to people. I was (and in a lot of ways, still am) so lost after they passed away, I just wanted somehow to keep them alive. 
Since I am a working comic artist, this medium seemed the best way to do it. 
So what is the book about.
Parker part 1
Part 1 Cover
Parker from part 1
This story is about Parker's dream to see me in this world.  We planned on raising Parker to  follow his dreams and that is exactly what he attempts to do in Part 1.
In the book, souls are the rarest of treasures. Parker, a child lost, is the purest and rarest of all. Known as a forever soul, he is most coveted by the evil that exists within his world. Parker,  who  is 14 in the book (the date they passed)  struggles to understand why he and his mother were taken away from all who loved them. In Adventures of Parker Reef part 1, he longs to ask me those questions, and to understand loss and the pain it brings. To even try and get those answers, Parker must set off on a secret adventure, through a treacherous land known as the Nothing. Within the Nothing,  all lost souls and those souls that remain of people who did evil on this world, exist. A coveted "gift", Parker will have to navigate his way through these evil lands, in hopes of making it to me.  Armed with only some items his mother has brought him  (after passing) from my studio, he sets off on his quest! I cant tell you more, Ill ruin part 1 if you havent read it! 
Now, Part 2! 
Parkers best friend-Gi-Gantic
Not everyone is happy about Parkers adventure
The Soul Guardian relays the news to Parker of actions and consequences
Because of the incredible outpouring of support for part 1,we are bringing Parker home!
pencils
The world Parker left, is much different than the one he returns to, after the events in part 1.
The barriers between the land of forgotten souls, the Nothing and "Somewhere" (Parker and Tanas home) are crumbling. Much has been impacted due to what Parker did and now, the evil that pursued him, is after much more than one soul!
Parker and JB, will not have an easy trip back home
In part 1, Parker was on his adventure for his own need to have answers...in part 2, he MUST make it back home before those who pursued him, gain entrance into his land, and terrorize those he knows and loves. On his way home, he must come to grips with his own losses he has experienced since beginning his quest, and the fact his actions have set in motion an imbalance in the place he calls home. This is no longer just about him, but about all the people his first adventure impacted.
Expect more creatures and with more at stake, more of those who have done evil, will be taking notice and pursuing Parkers soul.  Actions have consequences, even in death.  Parker must get home, but getting there, may prove more difficult than crossing over. 
 The PARKER REEF statue will be made by the same team that made the popular GI-GANTIC statue pictured below
First stretch goal will be the GI-GANTIC COLORING BOOK!!  
If we hit 18K ALL BACKERS will get the 24 page coloring AND activity book! 
So many talented Artists contributing drawings! 
Nate Lovett
Ryan G Browne
Ryan Kincaid
Jason Meents
Chris Uminga
Coloring book cover. Colors by Nate Lovett!
The incredible toy manufacturer, Loose Collector, who sculpted the wildly popular Gi-Gantic statue, will be making the Limited Edition Parker Reef one, as well.
