campaign.story:
The Living Corpse: Relics
The Living Corpse rises from the grave in an all new 160+ page original graphic novel by the Corpse Crew- Ken Haeser, Buz Hasson and Blair Smith. It's also the 10th anniversary of The Living Corpse so we're bringing you the biggest LC story yet!
Corpse Crew Ken, Blair and Buz
Who is The Living Corpse?
Once he was a mindless zombie, but now he is The Living Corpse, protector of the border between the world of the living and the realm of the dead!
The Living Corpse
What is Living Corpse: Relics about?
The Living Corpse: Relics picks up after the events of Living Corpse: Exhumed. Don't remember what happened? Grab a bundle that includes digital versions of the entire LC library!
After the events of The Living Corpse: Exhumed, our undead hero has left his job as the Gatekeeper between the world of the living and the monsters that live in the shadows. Now living in a Monsterary in Tibet, The Living Corpse is called back into action when an ancient evil with ties to the Living Corpse’s past rises from the tombs of ancient Egypt.
Also, the young Vampire, Lilith goes on a search for her fellow Nosferatu to see if she is truly the last of her kind. And she might just regret that decision.
All of this as well as we learn more about Asteroth’s ties to the Gatekeepers and we find out exactly how John Romero died!
This is the biggest, most epic Living Corpse tale that is not to be missed.
What the hell am I buying?
The Living Corpse: Relics is a 160+ page original graphic novel that contains a brand new Living Corpse story as well as a ton of behind the scenes material like scripts, character designs and tons of great pin-ups from a bunch of kick ass artists. Plus we've got a ton of great extra rewards available nowhere else!
Living Corpse Relics trade cover
 Sketch covers
We've got two versions of the sketch cover to offer. The first is the regular black and white sketch cover sketched and signed by Ken, Buz and Blair. And we are also offering up a high end artist editon Living Corpse Relics sketch cover featuring a full color cover by all three of the Corpse Crew- Ken Buz and Blair.
TLC Relics sketch cover
  High end TLC Relics sketch cover
   Interior art
  Interior art
  interior art
  Interior art
  Interior art
  interior art
  Interior art
  interior art
Why a Kickstarter?
The Living Corpse is a creator owned book. That means that we don't make any money till after the book comes out. TLC: Relics is about 75% done and the kickstater will help us pay the bills while we finish up the rest of the book and to pay for printing.

I thought you guys were going to do a 6 issue mini series for TLC Relics?
That was the original plan but in this age of binging whole seasons on Netlix, we decided to give you the whole thing all at once. What, did you really want to wait 6 months for the story to unfold? Didn't think so.
What about rewards?
Glad you asked! We've got tons of great rewards for those who back the project from stickers to high end, one of a kind Living Corpse merch. Check em out!
Original Artwork UPDATE!
We just added a bunch of original artwork packages to the Kickstarter! Check it out:
    Living Corpse double page spreads by Ken and Buz
Kickstarter exclusive T-Shirt!
Brand new Living Corpse Relics t-shirt available only in this Kickstarter! Don't be a Clint! Show your support!
TLC Relics exclusive shirt
Brand New Awesome Package!
Only 5 rad packages available!
Awesome Package
  The Living Corpse Magnet sculpted by Mark Ferris
  Living Corpse bust (14 inches tall) sculpted by Brian Dunn.
  Living Corpse mask sculpted by Gus Clark and painted by Eric Hooven
  Unpainted Living Corpse figure by Josh Milleker.
  Living Corpse custom figure sculpted by Josh Milleker and painted by Eric Hooven
  One of a kind Voodoo Corpse mask sculpted by Gus Clark and Painted by Eric Hooven
  One of a kind Toxic Corpse mask sculpted by Gus Clark and Painted by Eric Hooven
  One of a kind Swamp Corpse mask sculpted by Gus Clark and Painted by Eric Hooven
 Stretch Goals
We've got a ton of great stuff for stretch goals like bumper stickers, beer coozies, prints and official Corpse Crew patches. Stay tuned for updates as the stretch goals unlock!
Living Corpse beer coozie
  Living Corpse window stickers
  Living Corpse bumper stickers
  Corpse Crew patch design
 Thanks for helping us keep the dead, dead!

updates.update_userinfo: Corpse Crew Black Friday to Cyber Monday Print Sale!
updates.update_content: Corpse Crew Black Friday to Cyber Monday Print Sale!

Make sure to check out the new Kickstarter-- The Living Corpse: The Hexx Files going on right now!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/967343609/the-living-corpse-the-hexx-files?ref=nav_search&result=project&term=living%20corpse
It's a brand new Living Corpse story drawn by Ken, Buz and Blair and is written by the legendary co creator of Venom and Carnage-- David Michelinie!

updates.update_userinfo: The Living Corpse: The Hexx Files
The Living Corpse Relics is in the mail!
The Living Corpse: Relics has arrived!
updates.update_content: The Living Corpse: Relics trade paperbacks have arrived from the printer!

updates.update_userinfo: The Living Corpse: Relics is on its way!
updates.update_content:
The Living Corpse: Relics graphic novels are on their way to us from the printer! They tell us that they should be in our grubby little hands sometime in August and then we'll start making everyone's Kickstarter packages up and start sending them out. Stay tuned and we'll keep you updated as we know it!
And a huge thanks to Destry, who was cool enough to make up these bumper stickers! Everyone who ordered a physical copy of the book will get one of these bad boys in their packages to show the person stuck behind you in traffic what your favorite comic is!

updates.update_userinfo: The Living Corpse: Relics is at the printer!
updates.update_content:
Boys and Ghouls, The Living Corpse: Relics original graphic novel is at the printer! They tell us they should be in our claws in about 6 to 8 weeks. After that, we'll be putting together everyone's Kickstarter package.
Stay tuned for the next update when the books arrive!

updates.update_userinfo: The Living Corpse: Relics is done!
updates.update_content: Greetings Corpse Crew! Just wanted to let you all know that The Living Corpse: Relics is all done! We are currently in production putting the whole thing together and we are planning to go to press within the next month or so. We'll post more updates as we get ready to go to press!

The Living Corpse: Relics is getting close to being complete so we sent out the surveys for your email addresses for your digital rewards and regular addresses for your physical graphic novel and rewards!
We'll keep you updated as we finish up the book and send out the packages!
Thanks!

The Living Corpse: Relics is in the home stretch of being completed so it's time for you to send in your backer info! We are going to be sending out the surveys this week so fill them out quick and get them back to us. If you are one of the backers who got a shirt in their package, please include your shirt size!
And for the 15 backers who chose to be immortalized in The Living Corpse: Relics, we need you to send us some pics of your beautiful mugs. Front shot from the waste up is preferred. Only tasteful nudes will be excepted. Email your pics to:

campaign.story:
AMARA ENTERTAINMENT 
                                   AND
                  KID COMICS PRESENTS
                                  PURGE - A NEW DIRECTION
My name is Roosevelt Pitt, Jr. I'm the creator, owner and publisher of PURGE. I've been a comic book fan for most of my childhood and adult life. Comics have ignited my creativity and given me the drive to create stories and characters that can inspire and touch the heart of those who never saw themselves as being the hero. My desire since launching my very first black white comic in 1992, has been to create characters of color that would represent the very best African and African Americans have to offer. And thus Purge was born. After a year of sweat and tears, Purge - A New Direction is complete. A labor of love that was forged through a collaboration with KID Comics. Now together we are ready to take the next step.
        WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT TO BRING PURGE TO PRINT!
Production costs have already been taken care of and all that's left is printing. Now I need YOU to help get this project over the finish line. We plan to send a completed issue one (32 pages) of the book for print by the end of August. The estimated cost for 1000 copies is about $2,500.
              FIND OUT WHAT YOUR BACKING WILL PRODUCE!
  Purge - A New Direction Cover By Keithan Jones and Xong Bros
  Interior Page By Larry Stroman and Mshindo Kuumba
  Interior Page By Larry Stroman and Mshindo Kuumba
  Interior Page 9 Illustrated By The Xong Bros
  Interior Page 14 Illustrated By The Xong Bros
  Interior Double Splash Illustrated By The Xong Bros
  Interior Page 19 Illustrated By The Xong Bros
  Interior Illustrated By The Xong Bros
  Interior Page 16
                                        VARIANT COVERS
Purge - A New Direction Variant Cover A
  Purge - A New Direction Variant Cover By Larry Stroman
  Purge - A New Direction Variant Cover C By Charles Ben Jones
   Purge has taken on the mantle, hero of New Salem, a state-of-the -art metropolis he himself designed. The vision of New Salem is to build a true utopia within the network of modern America. However, nefarious forces threaten to destroy that vision and exploit Purge's para-natural abilities for their purposes. Now more than ever, Purge must live up to his title as the purifier, the protector of the city and the people he vowed to lead to a better world. Can he do it?
Richard Kincaid is haunted by a dark past. A past he can barely remember, but will never forget. Something horrific yet incredibly prolific transformed him into the man he is today. A man with the mind of a computer and the power of a god. Today he is Purge. 
 If this is your first introduction to New Salem's first and most famous hero, then know that he has a long history.  Purge debut in 1993 and has been featured on Entertainment Tonight, USA Today and Newsweek. Recently he has graced these social media outlets.
                                                                       NEW SALEM 
New Salem Concept Art By Tan Ho Chin
New Salem is the first fully functional mecha city in the world, whose infrastructure operates on an undisclosed number of complex and centralized software platforms working in unison. It's believed mystical forces of African origins are at play that maintains the city's vibrant allure and citizen solidarity to build a leading and self sufficient society.
New Direction Designs by Keithan Jones
Purge - A New Direction Style Guides
  Purge - A New Direction Style Guides
  Purge - A New Direction Style Guides
 The Creative Team
Roosevelt Pitt, Jr. (creator, publisher, writer): I am the creator of Purge, and a thirty year plus veteran in the comic book industry. I publish under my company's banner AMARA Entertainment.
Larry Stroman (artist ): Larry Stroman truly needs no introduction; for he is a pioneer artist of great notoriety, whose accolades include Todd Johnson and Larry Stroman's Tribe, Black Panther, Alien Legion, X-Factor, and What If? X-Men.  
 Krishna & Balram Banerjee (artists,colorists, lettering and character design) Hailing from India, these twin brothers have given Purge new life and a style that befits a hero who is a master of the martial arts and a techno genius. 
Mshindo Kuumba (artist, lead character design and art director) Mshindo is arguably one of the most prolific visionaries, and a true leader of the black indie comic movement.  
Keithan Jones (Owner and founder of KID Comics, co-publisher of Purge, artist and Purge - A New Direction costume designer) Keithan creator of his own widely popular comic, the Powerknights, was the orchestrator of Purge's new look and new direction.   Visit http://www.kid-comics.com to find out more!
C.R. Ward (editor): C.R. Ward, writer and creator of the super powered detective Vegas Baby, and The Stronger, brings his expert editing skills to the project, giving the Purge story strength and cohesiveness.  C.R. Ward's work can be found here: http://www.kid-comics.com/
Vince White (letterer, logo and book design) Vince White's talent is near endless. Not only does he provide lettering and applies it to enhance the comic page with life and vibrance, but also enhances dialogue along the way.   Find out more about Vince and Will Power here https://www.facebook.com/thelegendofwillpower/
Appreciation and thanks goes out to Richard “Uraeus” Tyler, Charles Ben Jones, Vince White, Dewunmi Roye Okupe and Victoria Pittman for lending their design, inking  and layout skills to the project.  Animation teaser provided by Ed Riguad. Find his work here.  http://edwardrigaud.deviantart.com/  Purge theme song written and performed by Clifford Switchmatic Kennedy. Check out his work on Facebook. Last but not least, I thank my soul mate Rosalie Sexton for her love, support and encouragement from start to finish.  
Other Ways You Can Help
So pledge, share on Facebook, tell your family, friends and followers about this project in every social setting possible!
Every little bit helps.
Now go get a sneak peek at the beautiful covers, amazing interior artwork, as well as the incredible rewards being offered below.
(See more than one reward that you like? Not a problem. Simply select the highest/or most limited reward then add the price of any additional reward(s) to your pledge amount. It's that easy. IE: If you see one reward you want that's $40 and another lower reward for $20, select the $40 reward and add the additional $20 to your pledge for a total of $60 and make a note at the bottom of the form which additional reward you would like to receive.)
SAMPLE POSTER REWARDS!
  Purge Poster by Keithan Jones and Mshindo Kuumba
  Purge Poster By Keithan Jones
  Purge Poster By Xong Bros
  Zentra Poster By Sanford Green and Mshindo Kuumba
  Threshold Poster by Marvian Sianpar
                            PURGE REWARDS
    LEGEND CHART
    Unlock This Goal And We Donate 500 Books To Local Schools And Libraries!  And You Will Receive Behind Scenes Art Of Our Animated Short! 
 Unlock This Goal And We Jumpstart Book 2!  You will be the first to receive a exclusive digital copy with a cover by non other than Jason Pearson! And receive the Purge Poster Pack which includes the exclusive KID Comics poster below!
The KID In You Never Dies!
  Issue 2 Cover Layout *Art and Layout Subject To Change.
  Unlock This Goal And Become A Credited Producer Of  The 30 Second Animated Short! And Receive A Digital Copy And A Exclusive Art Book Signed By The Creative Team!
Take a sneak peek at the animated screen shots included in the art book.
Sample Purge Animated Screen Shot By Ed Rigaud
  Sample Purge Animated Screen Shot By Ed Rigaud
  View Our Sample Animated Teaser!
PLAY

Special Bonus Poster Rewards When We Surpass The $8000 Mark! All Backers Who Pledge $20 or More Will Receive Both 18 x 24 inch Posters Below!
BSH Montage Poster By Mshindo Kuumba
  PURGE - A New Direction Poster By Mshindo Kuumba
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
My goal is obviously for everything to go according to plan without any hiccups, but in reality you cannot plan for every contingency. There are certain factors that could get in the way of progress (e.g international printing/shipping issues). However I know how to avoid many pitfalls due to my thirty plus years as a publisher. My goal is to handle any issues, should they arise in a professional manner by sending out daily messages via the Kickstarter updates thread. I believe in 100% transparency and you guys deserve nothing less. I intend to keep every backer, fan and supporter informed by providing updates on a regular and timely manner.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: TWO DAYS LEFT FOR PURGE BLACKOUT: DOUBLE IMPACT! GET YOURS!!
updates.update_content: We passed our first stretch goal and we have two days left to reach the 2nd!  Our next stretch goal is attainable and rewardable for all backers! If we surpass  $5,050 each backer will receive ARTIST SKETCH CARDS, great for conventions and a downloadable animated clip by Ed Rigaud of PURGE racing to the rescue to protect the innocent! We are just $124 away! Continue to share and pass the word!

We have decided to give our previous backers first dibs!
So we launched a day early just for you guys!
Your loyalty and patience is greatly appreciated and its because of you that we are still doing our best to provide quality content featuring African American heroes.
We thank you!

I'm thrilled to announce that the Purge Blackout campaign will be launched Monday September 23rd! campaign.story:
After finding the recently salvaged battleship empty of all munitions, the KLANDARIAN PIRATES are hot on the trail of Captain Roenick and his crew of wreckers. 
They will stop at nothing to finish their task and build their supply of weapons in order to wreak havoc on the galaxy.
Bill and Brigby are meeting with an old friend to move some critical cargo passed federation customs...
 ...while Ty'r is restricted to the Harrier IV salvage ship. 
We meet a new character and we see a little more into the deadly security firm, BLACKBANE! 
Join us for Part 2 of The Wreck Raiders... where things will heat up and the showdown between the pirates and Ty'r begins... 
...this you don't want to miss!

campaign.story:
What is P.B.Soldier?
P.B.Soldier is a science fiction adventure that follows covert operative Nat Cummings, a skilled computer hacker using his skills to help pay for college tuition when his activities are discovered and he becomes listed as an International Terror Threat - code red. 
Top Terror Threat
The newly formed government/paramilitary organization called The Establishment, gives him a simple choice, either work with them to become a highly-trained assassin or be terminated.
  P.B.Soldier hacking into Nexus
Cummings, a sniper class operative specializing in hacking, hand-to-hand combat, blade combat and stealth, is exceptional at his job. Until the day he meets Jazen, a mark and former E-Operative who knows more about him and “The E” than he does. Nat is confronted with the stunning realization that his work might not be for the greater good. 
 Now he’s on a quest to learn the truth while coding an elaborate program to divest himself from The Establishment before becoming its next target.
P.B.Soldier is The Bourne Identity meets V for Vendetta as Cummings becomes a double-agent of sorts trying to bring down a system from the inside without letting those he cares about fall into harms way. 
    The goal of the kickstarter is to raise $8,500 for the production of Episode 3.0, the sixth installment of a thirteen book arc. Funds will go towards payment to line artist and colorist Abel Garcia and actual production of the book, including printing and distribution. In addition, some of the proceeds are being donated to the Central High School Pre-Engineering Academy in Newark, NJ. - a program that i have taught and led for the past 13 years.
Naseed Gifted of PBS Media Using Comics to Teach S.T.E.M. at Steven Institute of Technology
     What is STEM? 
S.T.E.M. or Science, Technology Engineering and Math Programs are often the lowest funded and the lowest graduated in urban areas and Gifted is working hard to change those statistics by using his own graphic novel, traveling the country speaking at schools, comic book conventions and after-school programs, introducing young African-Americans and Latinos to the world of P.B.Soldier one comic book at a time.
     ***NEW REWARD ADDED 9/10*** 
NEW! Dieselfunk Poster Perk!!
Check out this new Episode 3 Line Art from the upcoming comic!
       ***REGULAR PERKS STILL AVAILABLE!***
      About the Creators
Naseed Gifted, Creator/Writer of P.B.Soldier
Naseed Gifted a two-time Glyph Comic Awards and Urban Action Showcase nominee, an educator, engineer and writer. A New Jersey native, he is also a graduate of the New Jersey Institute of Technology. His childhood obsession with comics rarely portrayed heroes that resembled him which fueled his desire to inject more diversity in the world of comic books. His mission in his graphic expression is to encompass a distinct balance between unprecedented storytelling and exceptional artwork. He is also the founder of New Jersey’s Black Comic Book Festival “Khem Comic Fest” and travels across the country as a panelist for Full Spectrum: Why Color in Comics Matters and Using Comics to teach STEM. 
Abel Garcia, Illustrator of P.B.Soldier
Abel Garcia hails from Barcelona, Spain. He has been the artist on the entire P.B.Soldier series and will be collaborating with writer/creator Naseed Gifted for Episode 3.0. From an early age, Garcia liked to draw. As a youth, he studied illustration and animation at various art schools in Barcelona, Spain. His work can be seen in the comics Bad Puppy and Nancy in Hell published by Image Comics (USA) and Drums, #2, 3 and 4, published by Image Comics (USA) and Dibbuks Editorial (Spain). Today, Garcia lends his talent to numerous comics, with various themes, enjoyed in many different parts of the world. He now resides in Mollet del Valles, Barcelona, with his wife, daughter and cat.
THANK YOU!
First off we want to thank everyone who has supported P.B.Soldier project thus far. We can’t put into words how inspiring it is to us to see your ongoing support. It has kept our dreams alive and allowed us to get to this point - the completion of our long anticipated Episode 3.0 is ready for the presses.
I would like to thank special individuals that keep my fire burning. First the Creator and the Ancestors for allowing me to persevere through the good and tough times, my children (Bakari and Layla) for tagging along with me on this journey and inspiring to develop a Legacy for our family, The PBS Media Team (Khaaz, Darrell, Dilettante, Abel and Manoli) because the best is yet to come, Abu Sheriff of Morning Star Productions a star in his own right, Brother Mshindo, Adewunmi Roye, Tim Fielder and Shawn Alleyne your work has inspired to stay phocused and pushing harder, Tiyland Consulting for helping us get to this point without your assistance this would not be possible, my Central High School family (Staff and Students), my family and friends for the constant support and love you show even when cards are not in our favor and my mother and father for giving me the opportunity to walk this Earth and make a difference.

campaign.story:
A Message to Backers & Well Wishers:
Hey everyone,
We'd like to thank each and every backer who pledged to our project. Unfortunately, we are too far below our goal so we are canceling the project with under 24 hours to go. We will come back stronger from this and look forward to your participation.
For updates to the project please like and visit our facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/plan10fromouterspace/
Or join our newsletter:
http://secretsofthesire.com/sign-mikebooks-newsletter-get-sire-1-digital-download/
We'll update you there!
-Mike & James
NEW REWARDS ADDED!
It's crunch time people - time to get creative! Want to be flown out to NYC for a live seance? We got it! Want US to fly to YOU dressed as our characters for Halloween and scare the beejebuz out of your neighbors? We'll do it!
Check out the new rewards now!
When Ed Wood set out to make Plan 9 from Outer Space, he never knew what a cult following he would create.
He set out to create a movie that featured many of the things that scared people in previous horror flicks: Aliens, Zombies, Vampires and Ghouls. Seeing humanity as the ultimate threat to life in the universe, the aliens come to exterminate us. They do so by reviving our recently dead and keeping them under their control. 
In the end, the humans win, of course, but the aliens never come back. They run home with their tails tucked between their legs. There was no Plan 10... until now. 
So, where do the aliens go when they've already attempted to use our own dead against us? What if they discovered they need not raise zombies from the grave to defeat us when we already possess devices that make us zombies? What if they could hack into that device and use them to make us their puppets? 
Plan 10 from Outer Space Cover 1
 That was then..this is now.
In this updated sequel to the Ed Wood classic we answer the question: Why raise the dead to destroy humanity when our cell phone culture is doing a fine job of it on its own.
This is Mike Dolce, host of Secrets of the Sire podcast and co-creator of this new Kickstarter campaign with writer James Mascia:
Plan 10 From Outerspace.
Our story takes place in the tiny town of Carmel-By-The-Sea, reimagining the original Plan 9 for our modern times. In this version, our heroes are no strangers to fiendish ghouls, vampires and zombies and quickly dispatch the so-called threat.
The aliens are left with no choice: Plan 10: enslave humanity through a mobile app called Sentient and destroy us one cell phone at a time.
To make our 64-page graphic novel come true we’re looking for 7,500 dollars, the cost of which will be applied to our artist Osiris Junior, our cover artists Soussherpa and Tony Moy and to our various rewards.
Do you like sketch packages and massive comic books rewards? We got em. How about being drawn into the book with a speaking line before you’re unceremoniously decapitated? Yep, it’s there too. And the ultimate packages include Live Radio Air time as a guest or co-host on my show.
Truly, this Kickstarter is unlike any that has come before…or before that or before that. This is Plan 10.
It’s humans vs aliens vs technology for the fate of our world.
Page 1
  Page 2
  Page 3
  Page 4
  Page 5
We have some great rewards for this campaign, including exclusive prints, comics and graphic novels. Certain rewards will even get you (or someone you choose) drawn into the comic! You can even be a guest on Mike's radio show, Secrets of the Sire. Or maybe you have your own comic project--our cover artist would be glad to design your cover for you! So, scroll on through and take a look at what you can get in addition to Plan 10 from Outer Space! Look below for a breakdown.
Early Artwork for our Alternate Cover by Shousherpa
                   The Poe Murders Reward
  The Sire Reward
  Print of Bela Lugosi as Dracula by Soussherpa

support.title: Outlandish Reward #3: Trick or Treat!
support.descp:
We are almost 2 days away from completion and the momentum has swung our way! To help keep it going, we are offering outlandish award #3: Trick or Treat!
If you pledge $5,000, both James and I will fly to your house (in the USA) dressed as characters from Plan 10 and scare the poop out of unwitting trick or treaters. We will also bring candy, new pairs of pants and a special Halloween exclusive version of Plan 10 #1, containing the first 22 pages of story and the alternate cover by Soussherpa to hand out to said victims.
You won't be required to feed James and I, but dinner would be nice. Taco Bell is pretty good. Home cooked meals even better. We'll be working hard out there. We deserve it.

updates.update_content:
Hey all,
I mentioned the other day that I was launching a new campaign. Well, it is officially live as of this afternoon, and we've almost hit the 20% mark already!!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/drenproductions/anti-christ-an-occult-thriller-graphic-novel

Hey all,
We wanted to thank you once again for being gracious enough to back Plan 10. We were sad to see it go, but the good news is, we can still try again.
In the meantime, I wanted to share a new project I've been working on. It's called Anti-Christ:

updates.update_userinfo: We fought the good fight BUT...
updates.update_content:
Hey everyone,
We'd like to thank each and every backer who pledged to our project. Unfortunately, we are too far below our goal so we are canceling the project with under 24 hours to go. We will come back stronger from this and look forward to your participation.
For updates to the project please like and visit our facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/plan10fromouterspace/
We are almost 2 days away from completion and the momentum has swung our way! To help keep it going, we are offering outlandish award #3: Trick or Treat!

If we can't bring Ed Wood back from the dead we'll sure as hell try to speak with him!
We'll fly any backer out to NYC and put them up in a hotel for 1 night. Then we'll conduct a seance with a local medium live on my radio show. (Out of country? Tack on an additional $500 for airfare)

updates.update_userinfo: New Rewards! Bring Ed Wood Back To Life!
updates.update_content: Ok folks we're at crunch time for Plan 10. So we're opening up the big time rewards. Donate a thousand bucks - we bring director Ed Wood back to life.

Much like the 1959 cult classic of which we are basing the story on, it looks like the Plan 10 Kickstarter will be relegated to cult status as well as THE WORST KICKSTARTER IN HISTORY! We're kind of proud of that in a way lol.

updates.update_userinfo: Overseas Backers Welcome - All Rewards Open To Non-U.S. Residents!
updates.update_content:
Hey folks,
With 2 weeks to go we've opened up our project to all overseas backers! That's right, all Non US residents now have access to the great rewards! Got a buddy in Berlin that's into Plan 9? Pass along the link! Got some friends in the U.K. that want their brand of zombie fun? Tag them in a post! Great rewards include: sketches, prints and more!
FEATURED REWARD: Be a guest on the Secrets of the Sire podcast hosted by Yours Truly! We talk comics, movies, TV, music and more every Wednesday at 8pm ET on , stream it live on and post it to iTunes, Google Play and SoundCloud! Be a part of the conversation with this awesome reward!

campaign.story:
Help Us Bring The Consul to Life
Future Earth Entertainment, the publisher of the sci-fi series Earth Alliance is excited to announce a new series. Gabriel Quinn is The Consul, a bold new take on espionage thrillers. A traditional spy series with a sci-fi twist.The Consul is a 26 page full colored comic book. Future Earth Entertainment seeks your support to bring this Sci-Fi/Espionage thriller to life. All of the money raised will go directly to the artist working on the book.
A Consul is defined as a person appointed to protect and promote citizens and their interest. 
The Story
Harrison Manning, a man proudly serving his country is shot down over enemy territory. His lifeless body is resurrected by an alien race called the Telen's. The Telen's are a altruistic race from a distant planet. They feel humanity has great potential but needs help to reach that potential. Harrison is sent back to Earth as a Consul ( Protector of humanity).
Enjoy some completed pages from The Consul.
Illustration by Steve Bentley, colors by Shawna Madd
  Harrison Manning, a man proudly serving his country is killed in battle.
Illustrated by Steve Bentley, colors by Shawna Madd
Resurrected by the Telen's an Altruistic alien race. 
   And is given a second chance to serve, as a Consul.
  Splash page from The Consul Issue #1
 REWARDS
The Cover for The Consul, available in 11x17 prints in certain reward tiers. 
The Cover of "The Consul Issue #1. Art and colors by Steve Bentley
 11x17 print of The Consul, available in some reward tiers.
 ISSUES 1 & 2 OF EARTH ALLIANCE AVAILABLE IN CERTAIN TIERS.
Covers for Earth Alliance Issue 1&2
 The Consul T-Shirts
  The Creative Team
Raymond Fields - Creator/Writer
Founder of Future Earth Entertainment. Known as the creator of the SciFi comic book series Earth Alliance.
Steve Bentley - Illustrator
Shawna Madd - Colorist
Shawna served as colorist on several indie comics including Hybrids: Sons of God from Tenacious Comics.
Social Media
Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/futureearthentertainment/

FEE Website - www.futureearthent.com
Twitter - @scifiwriter1

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I'm very proud of the fact that during our very successful first campaign for EA Issue #1. We delivered all rewards on time.

I've spent the last twenty seven years in various management roles in a large corporation. I've led large projects and managed large teams of employees spread across vast geography's. While that may not directly correlate to producing comics. It does provide you assurances that I'm firmly qualified to deliver a quality product on time. I know how to align myself with good quality people.

I can tell you that both Steve and Shawna have been very professional and timely with their respective assignments. I don't foresee any issues. We have a completed script that is waiting to be brought to life by these wonderful artist.

They have truly been a joy to work with.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
PLAY

        Boldly go... Into the Suck
Into the Suck is a six issue mini series about a Privateer/Bounty Hunter named Ursula who has been hired to bring in a human from the far away planet Earth. Along the way she is pursued by a mysterious adversary, her pirate father, and the entire Royal Army. The Suck refers to the trash laden area of space where the lowlifes and creeps reside. What better place to do business, if you're tough enough.
Ursula makes knows how to make an entrance!
Issue #1 is the start of something big. The success of this campaign will take us to the next level and ensure the completion of the series with Issue #2 already rocketing toward completion itself. We hope that you will jump in with us on the ground floor and ride this beast all the way to the top. 
I am thrilled to work with the art team on this book as it comes to life. CB Zane, Oracle (Facebook's PH Fuller) and Letterist  Kel Nuttel have outdone themselves. You really have to see it to believe it.
From the few people who have had the chance to read issue 1, I've heard:
This looks great.
This is going to be huge.
It feel like the late 80's Indy stuff I love, but with much cleaner execution.
I already have a really good sense of the main crew without a whole lot of exposition, which for a first issue is great!
And my favorite...
I laughed so hard I scared my cat.
So please, suit up, cross your fingers and join our crew. Let us entertain you. 
The crew of the Queen B
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
At this time, Issue #1 is completely finished and ready for print. We already have a printer secured and are ready to go. The successful funding of this project will pay for the printing of the issue, the rewards and give us a head start on issue #2 which itself is over halfway complete.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: Love's First Kiss
support.descp: $1 gets you the love and undying respect of a writer, two artists and one lucky potential publisher.

support.title: Instant Gratification
support.descp: $5 allows you to be like all the cool kids these days, wanting everything instantly and on demand. This level grants you the complete digital copy of issue 1.

support.title: Let's Get Physical
support.descp: This level puts the printed copy of Into the Suck issue 1 right in your hands. Gorgeously printed and signed by the series creator/writer and boasting the eye catching cover art by series artist CB Zane.

support.title: Seeing Double
support.descp: This level puts the printed copy of Into the Suck issue #1 right in your hands. Gorgeously printed and signed by the series creator/writer and boasting the magical cover art by series colorist Oracle.

support.title: Make Your Own Magic
support.descp: This is also the physical copy of Into the Suck Issue #1 but this time with a black and white coloring book cover drawn by series artist CB Zane. Bring your own magic to this epic masterpiece.

support.title: The Unlimited Potential
support.descp: This is the proverbial blank slate. It's issue #1 of Into the Suck with a wrap around blank matte cover with only our logo leaving the rest of this "real estate" open for you or your favorite artist to decorate in a manner you see fit.

support.title: The Twins
support.descp:
This is Cover A by CB Zane and Cover B by
Oracle.

support.title: The Connoisseur
support.descp: The amazing Jen Broomal, long time cover artist for Big Dog Ink and Aspen Entertainment has graced us with an exclusive masterpiece just for our Kickstarter. This cover is sure to make you the envy of all your friends.

support.title: The One of Six
support.descp: This is also issue #1 of Into the Suck with a killer connected cover piece. Issue #1 is the top left portion. Collect all six issues as they come out to get the full spectacle.

support.title: The One Up
support.descp: The One Up is in response to a request I received asking about adding Cover B to his purchase of a sketch cover. So with this level, for a discounted rate you can get the sketch cover blank variant and either Cover A or B. Your choice.

support.title: Take a Risque
support.descp:
What would a good comic be without the temptation of a little naughtiness? This reward gets you this rare, exclusive Kickstarter variant cover.
Obviously adults only.

support.title: Share a Room with Ursula
support.descp: Decorate your room with a 24X36 poster of Cover A's artwork. Not enough? We are also including three signed 11X17 prints of different images by series colorist Oracle to even it out and occupy more space. They will be lovingly rolled in a poster mailer to protect your precious cargo. (Also, Ursula is not fond of wrinkles) The printed Cover A will also be included (not rolled)

support.title: Hire a Killer
support.descp: Killer artist that is, for a paltry $50 you get the sketch cover variant of Into the Suck #1 with a one of a kind original hand drawn sketch of Ursula’s lovely head and shoulders by series artist C.B. Zane. This will be limited, signed and numbered.

support.title: Go Ahead, Get Picky
support.descp: For $60 you can get any character’s head on the cover drawn by hand just for you by the great C.B. Zane, signed and numbered

support.title: Full Frontal
support.descp: For $80 you can have an entire full body sketch of Ursula or any other Into the Suck character drawn by C.B. Zane. Again, signed and numbered. Ursula works hard on her figure; why not admire it in the rawest form.

support.title: The Collector
support.descp: This reward level gets you the CB Zane cover, the Oracle cover, the Jen Broomal cover, the Coloring Book cover, AND the Naughty Variant. Now that's a steal even Ursula would respect!

support.title: The Noble Hunter
support.descp: This reward guarantees all six connect covers as they come out. Upon printing, one connect cover will be shipped to you for each issue. This guarantees that you will get the entire set. Because the nature of this reward means it will come in overtime and we all love that whole instant gratification… we will send you the issue 1 connect cover AND a big 24”x36” fully colored poster of the entire connected picture to hang on your wall.This will be the ONLY legal way to get this poster. A true Kickstarter exclusive to you who has such good taste to invest in us at this level.

support.title: The Killer Swag Pack
support.descp: For $200 you get every cover of issue 1 including two sketch covers, one blank and one with your choice of any full body sketch of any character by C.B. Zane. You will also get an 11x17 of covers by CB Zane, Oracle, and Jen Broomal! Wait, there is more! You will also get pins and magnets sporting characters from Into the Suck and a personal letter from the writer Keith Thomas thanking you for your involvement and providing you a good idea of what is to come in the following issues. Did I hear someone say stickers? We’ve got stickers. Heck, we’ll even send you a 24”x36” poster of Cover A!

support.title: Get in on the Action!
support.descp: In issue #3 there is a Black Market scene with room for three prominent characters to be designed in your image along with your name and a word bubble. That's right, you can have a proverbial walk-on is our third amazing issue! Also, this will include a sketch cover of YOU as you will appear in the issue drawn by series artist CB Zane.

support.title: The Professional Touch
support.descp: Get a cover for your OWN comic project by series artist C.B. Zane and one of our project cover colorists. This will be delivered in the form of a digital file in high resolution sized and ready for print. You will also receive Issue #1 of Into the Suck.

updates.update_content:
Apparently an entire batch of overseas rewards have gone missing somewhere between here and customs. I waited in hopes that they would turn up but sadly it has become too long and action is required. 
To those of you still waiting, we are assembling replacements and will have them headed back out soon.
Sorry for the delays. We have not forgotten.

Merry Christmas from your friends here at Stormholder Entertainment, C.B., Oracle, Kel and myself. 
May your day be merry and bright! 
-Keith

I apologize to those of you still waiting for your rewards. I am working on finishing the shipping this week. 
My dad has been fighting pancreatic cancer and has taken a quick turn for the worst. Between the hospital and trying to keep things together, the shipping plan has fallen behind.
I will get these out as soon as possible and will be sending out a little extra to make it up to you.

updates.update_userinfo: An update with all filler and no meat...
Into the Suck meets New York Comic Con
updates.update_content:
I just returned from NYCC where I displayed preview copies of our little book here to potential publishers and believe me, it met with some good compliments and serious potential.
In the meantime, the full shipment should be in by the end of the month and we will get these beauties out to you. 
Thank you for your patience and enjoy this glimpse of issue 3.

Hey everyone,
 Our current expected date of Issue 1 arriving to us from the printers is the end of October. You have my word, as soon as the full set arrives I will let you know and we will be as busy as Christmas Elves filling each and every order.
The anticipation is killing us.

While we wait for the printer to complete our order and deliver, the Into the Suck team is far from sitting on our hands.
 Issue 2 is in the bag and issue 3 is quickly approaching halfway through final art. And believe me, it remains top notch! Don't take my word for it, see for yourself.

updates.update_userinfo: The Digital Copy of Issue 1 has been sent!
updates.update_content:
To all backers from the Instant Gratification level and up, check your email today and find the digital copy of Issue 1 of Into the Suck!
It was our decision that every backer who has to wait for the print copy shouldn't have to wait for the chance to see the book. Therefore we have sent the digital to all of you.
If for some reason you did not receive yours, please shoot me a message with your current email address and we will get that right to you. (And we will also blame Squee)

There will be surveys coming out this week to help us determine where to ship and what we are shipping. At the moment our order has been assembled and submitted. Printing is awaiting the arrival of funds. After that, the estimate for printing is 4-6 weeks. 
Rest assured, we will have these bad boys packaged and shipped as soon as humanly possible because you are our first priority. Without you we wouldn't be doing this.
Thank you!

campaign.story:
Hi guys! Welcome to my kickstarter. My name is Keithan Jones, the founder of KID comics and creator of, The Power Knights! The PK is a team of characters I originally created when I was eleven years old. As I grew older and pursued a successful career in graphic design, I found myself doodling the PK in my spare time. This growing feeling that I owed my eleven year old self a shot at turning the PK into a real comic, became too strong to ignore. It was time. I spent the better of the last two years, writing, drawing, and coloring issues #1 and #2 of The PK. In the process of doing that, I also founded a publishing brand called KID to release the PK under. I'm hoping you guys will be inspired to help me print, market, and distribute, The Power Knights #1 and #2 for all to enjoy. Thank you so for your support!
The Power Knights: Unbounded #2 cover
  The story is focused on two brothers, Kandle and Davion Watson, and how their lives were completely upended by their encounter with six uniquely powered warriors, Metal Star, Bluzara, Dragon Blaze, Camouflage, Princess Raxi and Warseed. These extraterrestrial warriors were sent into a blackhole, to die for war crimes they committed against their will. Yet, they inexplicably survive, and crash land on Earth. To avoid detection from mankind, some assimilate into society, while others live reclusively in the shadows. Warseed however, scoffs at taking a backseat to the weaker human race. He desires to take command of his own destiny by transforming humans into a powerful hybrid army to take control of Earth. Davion Watson, mourning the loss of his father to an incurable disease, is seduced by Warseed's promise of a new world, where disease and suffering are eliminated through science. Inedibly, Warseed soon discovers, mankind is not so easily tamed, as he is ultimately betrayed by Davion.
What happens next is chronicled in the pages of The Power Knights: Unbounded #1 – #2 and beyond.
Kandle and Davion Watson. Brothers torn apart.
  Warseed and the other Knights share a dark past.
      From Left: King Sinoj, Octa-Gun, Warseed, Bluzara, Metalstar, Princess Raxi, Dragon Blaze, Lion Storm, Camouflage, Rebellion, Detective Tripli, Lieutenant Nikubum
 The Power Knights # 1 debuted in 2015. It was the first comic released under the KID comics brand. KID is a comic book publisher dedicated to bringing back the fun and adventure of sequential art. We are about the synergy between the reader and the page! Meaning, you are a part of the creative process as you flip through the pages. You add the sound of the heroes' voice or the clanging of deadly blades as warriors fight on cosmic battlefields. That is the uniqueness of comic books, it is a subconsciously collaborative medium. If you've never read one, make a KID comic your first. Enjoy!
The Power Knights: Unbounded #1 cover
  These t-shirts are like magic! Put one on and presto, your day instantly gets brighter! See Reward #5 "Wear Your Power Proudly!"
White-T available in SM/M/LG/XLG
  Black-T available in SM/M/LG/XLG
Every reward includes a copy of The Power Knights #1! Let's take a look at a few pages from that issue...
      Now let's take a look at some pages from The Power Knights #2. The good news is, this book is already completed! However, it needs your valuable support to be printed and distributed for all to enjoy! 
      Where does the money go? The chart below breaks it all down...
    Kandle is a teenage firebrand. Full of aggressive energy, ready to take on all comers even when it's against his better judgement. On the surface he's brash, but it's just a front to hide the pain he's feeling for his tormented older brother, Davion. While others feel Davion is too dangerous to live, Kandle has taken it upon himself to save him by any means necessary.
Weapons: A Lightning Shield that discharges bolts of concentrated electricity. Enhanced strength, generated from his fusion kevlar jacket. Both the shield and jacket were designed and engineered by Dragon Blaze.
Davion Watson, older brother of Kandle Watson, has gone partially mad. Barely surviving an attack by Warseed, his life is spared by Dragon Blaze's, ingenuity. An exoskeleton is grafted into his skin, to keep his body functioning through two micro-nuclear generators implanted into his shoulders. It has given him paranormal strength. Unfortunately, it also has damaged his mind and he suffers from bouts of severe paranoia.
Weapons: The HEL canon and an assortment of fire-arms collected from fallen enemies.
Dragon Blaze is a cybernetic flesh being of unknown origin. At least unknown to him as part of his memory has been deleted. He is an AITron-Type 9, AKA an engineer. He was specifically created to design and build machinery that utilizes the natural elements of any environment or world he finds himself on. Under the control of King Sinoj, he was forced to design weapons of war.
Powers: Plasma Fire, Flight, Organic Digital Processors (computer mind).
Octa-gun is a US government alpha-agent. He has no super powers. He relies on his field training and weapons constructed from technology reverse engineered from the spaceship the Power Knights crashed on Earth in. He is self assured and fearless. His primary mission: Bring The Power Knights into United States custody.
Weapons: A multi-cannon that fires 8 different elements: Fire, Ice, Electricity, Sonics, Lasers, Stun Beam, Nano nets, and a very dangerous distortion beam.
Princess Ozana Raxi is daughter to King Sinoj. Ozana is torn between the love and hate she has for her father. This causes conflict and mistrust from the other Knights. Her unique Oraxion fighting skills derive from her royal lineage. Her super dense skin, allows her to endure high-pressure impacts and extreme temperatures.  
Weapons: The Oraxi Spear. The Oraxi Spear can take the form of three; a sky creature, a land creature and a sea creature. Ozana can see through the eyes of these three creatures as they aid her in battle when necessary.
Get the infectious theme song of The Power Knights, "It's Yours"! Written, composed and performed by the rising star, Clifford "Switchmatic" Kennedy. 
Cover art for the Power Knights theme song MP3.
    Just for you guys, I will be posting a FREE short story called, PRESSURE- A POWER KNIGHTS STORY.  Take a glimpse into Davion Watson, AKA Rebellion's life as he comes across a young man who is contemplating suicide. It's a story that expresses some of the deeper themes found in the Power Knights. See the work in progress below. Enjoy!
Pencils by Keithan Jones

campaign.story:
Force Galaxia!
SOME TIME FROM NOW...
The story of Force Galaxia takes place at some point in the distant future, where Earth runs a fledgling empire which is itself part of the galactic federation, The Milky Way Defense Organization. Force Galaxia has multiple interconnected stories exploring this universe in each massive 64 page issue. 
In the first story, we are introduced to a group of super-powered teenaged bounty hunters who are running wild through Empire City. They will become Force Galaxia, the defenders of the Galaxy, in SUPERGREEN14.
Force Galaxia in Supergreen14
The second story in Force Galaxia is THE OMEGAN CHRONICLES where a now adult Francisco the Supergreen has journeyed to the distant planet Omega to locate his missing friend, King Red Skew. Upon arriving on the warring planet, he assembles a team to go on an arduous quest across the vast wilderness of Omega, from the slums of The Imperial City to the magical frontier of Garzanal.
Omegan Chronicles
The third tale in Force Galaxia follows the former member of Force Galaxia, the invincible superstrong cockney spouting MG, as she leads of group of all women detectives on Earth's rebellious Moon in MG and the SISTERS OF POWER.
MG and The Sisters of Power
Force Galaxia has been publishing since the first issue debut at San Diego Comic Con a few years ago. Since then Issues One and Two of the over-sized perfect bound 64 page anthology have been published and are available both as a hard copy and digital. 
This campaign is to raise funds to complete Issue Three and if we're blessed enough to reach our goal, then any stretch goals will go toward publishing our forthcoming guide to the Force Galaxia universe, Briscoe Savoy's Galactic Facts.
Please contribute to this project to continue to bring fun, exciting comics to life.
“…Fresh, funny, fiercely original-Force Galaxia Rules!”—Mike Flanagan, Director Oculus, Before I Wake  
“…Coolness from Cover to Cover.”—Omar Bilal, Curator Museum of Black Superheroes  
“…I Just read today, and greatly enjoyed. All continued Success.”—The late Dwayne McDuffie, creator of Ben 10, Damage Control
Force Galaxia #1
  Force Galaxia #2
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The only risk with investing in Force Galaxia is that you may contribute to the happiness of both children and adults alike. The major challenge I foresee is the artists not getting the project done in a timely manner; however, I've learned over the years you can't hurry good art. 

In that vane, one must always remember the old production triangle: FAST-GOOD-CHEAP. A project can only have two of the three at any given time and this must be remembered on any creative endeavor.

I'm uniquely qualified to run a successful campaign as I've already invested thousands of dollars and years of blood, sweat, and tears to get Force Galaxia to its current state.

Your investment will be in safe hands and I will spend every cent invested towards publishing Issue 3 of Force Galaxia.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
HELP US MAKE COMIC HISTORY!
Be Amazed Studios wants to do something revolutionary and we can only do it with your support! We are planning to Launch Earth Outlaws #2 and Galactic Bounty Hunters #1 together in one book. By using Kickstarter, we intend to push the envelope, not just in terms of content but also in terms of the artistry and originality. This comic will be distinctive and an outlier in the Independent comic book industry. With your support, Be Amazed Studios aims to be the first indy publisher to launch two of their biggest titles in one book.

  Reward #6  (Pledge $10 or more)
Earth Outlaws #2 and Galactic Bounty Hunters #1 Collector's Edition
  Collector's Edition
Signed & numbered
Limited to 1000 copies 
+ Certificate of Authenticity


EARTH OUTLAWS #2  When NASA declares the crew of the Ares-4 dead after the shuttle explodes in space, brother of the Ares pilot and former astronaut Dane Quaid assembles a team to find out what really happened during the doomed shuttle mission. In order to do that, they need to become outlaws. Dane Quaid and his team have broken into a highly secure NASA installation, fought past armed guards and gotten aboard the most sophisticated space shuttle ever built – the OTTO-12. Now they just need to figure out how to fly it. And with Stan Dixon, head of NASA mission operations on their trail, they need to do it fast. With the Earth Outlaws and Dixon both on the hunt for answers, a single line a corrupted code could be the key to it all. And that code brings Dixon straight to billionaire tech magnate Peter Callum. 

EO #2 -Interior Sequential Page - Art and Colors by Paul Green
EO #2 Interior art page 5
 
GALACTIC BOUNTY HUNTERS is a sci-fi thriller that follows the cut-throat and motor-mouthed Willow and her team of hulking alien partners-in-crime. One part FIREFLY and two parts RESERVOIR DOGS, GBH takes its audience on a fun, fast-paced, and subversive ride through the unexplored parts of the universe with a team of bounty hunters from all walks of life who have come together for their shared love of the one thing that unites us all… Cold hard cash.


GBH #1- Interior Sequential Page - Art by Romano Molenaar and Colors by John Rauch 

GBH #1 Interior art page 2

THE CREATIVE TEAM

Molly Schofield (creator, publisher, me): I create and published comics under my company Be Amazed Studios. The titles includes Earth Outlaws, Mutant Chasers, My Dad is a Superhero, Galactic Bounty Hunters and dozens other titles.  

Louis Pryor (creator, publisher ): Louis is the founder of Be Amazed Studios.  

Earth Outlaws #2  

Don Thomas (writer): Don is a comics veteran most known for writing Sideshow #1, Five #1, and contributing writer to Resonate #1, Point Blank #1 comic book anthologies.

Cody Stewart (co- writer): Cody, ongoing webcomic at constant-comic.com. Working on Tides #1
Paul Green (Illustrator): Cover art, interior pages and character designs. Paul is most known for working on OVERUN, Starship Troopers and Flash Gordon.
Galactic Bounty Hunters #1
Pat Shand writes comics (Iron Man, Robyn Hood, Vampire Emmy and the Garbage Girl, Hellchild), novels (Charmed for HarperCollins), and pop culture journalism (Sad Girls Guide, Blastoff Comics). 

Romano Molenaar (Illustrator): (X-Men, Detective Comics, Birds of Prey) http://www.artbyromano.com/

John Rauch (Colorist): Some of his works include 100% Marvel, Age of Heroes, 24Seven, Batman, Avengers: Heroes Welcome, The Beauty, Captain America, Convergence Aquaman, Deadpool, G.I. Joe, New Mutants, Spider-Man, Marvel Knights, Teen Titans, Superman/Batman, Venom, Fantastic Four, Wayward, X-Men, Wolverine, Star Trek, and Invincible.
  Taylor Esposito, letterer at DC Comics, former production artist/digital compositor for Marvel Entertainment, and graphic designer.


I want to thank my friend Thom Burgess who made our Kickstarter Trailer. You can see more of his work here https://vimeo.com/107051512
Other Ways You Can Help
So pledge, share on Facebook, tell your family, friends and followers about this project in every social setting possible!
Every little bit helps.
Now go get a sneak peek at the beautiful covers, amazing interior artwork, as well as the incredible rewards being offered below.
(See more than one reward that you like? Not a problem. Simply select the highest/or most limited reward then add the price of any additional reward(s) to your pledge amount. It's that easy. IE: If you see one reward you want that's $40 and another lower reward for $20, select the $40 reward and add the additional $20 to your pledge for a total of $60 and make a note at the bottom of the form which additional reward you would like to receive.)

campaign.story:
The HEROES of ULTRAKYLE
Page 1 from ULTRAKYLE
Page 2 from ULTRAKYLE (inks)
Page 2 of ULTRAKYLE (colored &lettered)
The artifacts were used in the creation of the universe and everything in it. In the beginning, there were hundreds of thousands of beings called scribes. They consisted of many different races and used their abilities together to create new worlds and new life. But over time, there were a few who began to want something for themselves, a life, a family. Someone to love them and something to call their own.
This resulted in several scribes leaving the ranks and creating worlds for themselves…worlds and denizens of these worlds who began to worship these scribes as gods. This didn’t sit well with the others and sparked a division in the ranks of the scribes. There were those who took upon themselves to try and forcibly remove these “fallen scribes” from their worlds and strip them of their power for fear that it might be used for ill.
In turn, this fueled the fire for a war amongst the scribes, a war that lasted for billions of years. Realizing that they could not be destroyed and the only way to stop it was to interrupt and essentially restart the process, the eldest and first among all scribes used his power to merge his brethren all together into a single entity, that which is believed to be the Touchstone and placed it at the far edges of the universe. Then the first scribe released his own spirit and abilities into four artifacts and relinquished his body to be absorbed into the Touchstone. When the four artifacts connected with the Touchstone, a cataclysmic event wave erupted from it, a “big bang” if you will, destroying the old universe and creating a new one in its wake, scattering the artifacts across the universe.
the ARTIFACTS
Ultrakyle is intended to be a monthly all ages science fiction action adventure comic 24 pages in length with no ads. It's a finite story with a BEGINNING, a MIDDLE and an END plotted out as 12 issues a years for 3 years.
To give a quick overview of the story: the Stylus finds Kyle, who is the Last Scribe. Kyle begins to use the stylus to create all kinds of things including a really wicked suit of hi-tech armor for himself and his friends, Tobias and Char, and brings to life his own comic book creation, Cybear, the cybernetic warrior bear. In between all this, we also are introduced to Z’itt, an evil alien emperor from the planet Draxill and learn of his quest to find and possess the Stylus for himself, with help from Alacarr, the only living being in the universe who is known to possess one of the actual artifacts (the staff of scales). Alacarr only helps Z’itt for fear of harm coming to his own family, which Z’itt holds captive there on the ship with them as they travel in search of the Stylus that they know to be on Earth thanks to the mystical bond all the artifacts share with one another.

updates.update_content:
Sorry for the long break in between updates. As many of you already know, we here on the East Coast got hammered by some snow and it's been touch and go with power and other things.
Big update. I got the Heroes poster done for the rewards. I ended up liking it so much that I've decided to make it the actual COVER to the comic. And I got the letters slapped on page 1 and busted a move on page 2, sketching it out, penciling it and inking it in about an 8 hour day.

So OFFICIALLY DAY 4 and we're already up $280!! That's not too terrible for 3 full days of pledges to a no name creator trying to launch a product with barely a blip on the internet radar screen. Started working on coloring the Hero Poster, drawing the Villain Poster, roughing in the cover and layouts on some more pages. I just got a new gig as a letterer for 412 Comics' Assassin Cat #1 which is keeping me a little busy as well as some art for a charity I'm associated with called CHERUBS: http://www.cherubs-cdh.org/.
Here's a look. Thanks again!

Day 3 of the Kickstarter and as well prepared and as informed as I thought I was, there was STILL a hell of a learning curve. First, I was NOT keen on putting a video up. I'm totally not happy with my visage and I didn't want people to judge my campaign from the ugly fat dude asking for money. But several of my friends told me (JR Blanton, Ray Dillon---thanks!) that adding a video adds to the credibility of the campaign, SHOWING potential contributors WHO it is they'll be giving their money to. So I did it, and it's up.
And then the postage. I had no idea that when people came to the page and opted to contribute, Kickstarter AUTOMATICALLY added a postage amount predetermined by me to their total pledge. I figured high on everything to be safe and apparently, that was a dumb move. So...I fought my slow internet, tried to do some research and came up with some numbers and went a few dollars more and locked them in. So, if any of you were trying to contribute before and didn't because of that, problem solved. If it's still wrong, let me know and I'll fix it.

To Robert Norton for being the FIRST backer of Ultrakyle! As a special thank you for being FIRST, Robert's getting upgraded to the $25 reward tier AND is getting an EXCLUSIVE ALL ORIGINAL ULTRAKYLE SKETCH just for him!

campaign.story:
SYNOPSIS OF SANE6: CATALYST
Two criminal contractors, thriving under the waning effectiveness of government leadership, stumble into the highest paying job of their careers. Along with a number of other specialists, they are tasked with hijacking a series of shipping trucks. The cargo is unknown and the client is secretive but the promise of a big payday is all they need to know.. or so they thought. As ugly truths surface about their employer, the crew must choose between continuing to work a dangerous job or facing the violent consequences of breaking their contracts. It's insane to think anyone will make it out alive.. of course, nobody would accuse them of being anything else.
MORE ABOUT SANE6: CATALYST
Sane6: Catalyst is where everything starts. This is the beginning of the contractors’ stories and the comic book that this Kickstarter Campaign revolves around. Sane6: Catalyst is a 36 page issue (the first from an arc of 4). There is a possibility of 8 more pages in the book if the Kickstarter Campaign raises 3,000$ or more.
Minimum Pledge: | DIGITAL COPY OF SANE6: CATALYST | (8$ CAD)
FIRST PAGES OF THE BOOK:
SANE6: CATALYST COVERS
Regular Cover by the Creator of Sane6, Rob Cannon. Front and back covers with all the contractors of Sane6.
 (ART IN PROGRESS)
Variant Cover by the artist Didier Mercadal «Hyman and Mitch One Hundred Dollar Bill»
This cover is taking the Front, Back and two fold parts inside the book. A GIANT BILL BECAUSE WE ALL LOVE MONEY, FELLAS!
BECAUSE WE'RE REAL NICE GUYS
Campaign Backers Digital Gifts
Every backers (1$ CAD to infinity$ CAD) will receive minimum of two digital gift for free every week! So, the sooner you back, the more gifts you will receive! The Campaign Backers Digital Gifts end at the same time of the Sane6: Catalyst Kickstarter Campaign.
LINK TO EARTH ALLIANCE #2 CAMPAIGN: https://www.kickstarter.com/earth-alliance-issue-2
WHERE DOES THE MONEY GO?
This project need 2 500$ CAD to be totally funded.
60% -  REFUND/PAY THE PRODUCTION
30% -PRINT YOUR PRODUCT
5% - KICKSTARTER FEES
5% - BANK FEES
ALL EXTRA MONEY  AFTER REACHING OUR OBJECTIVE WILL GO TOWARDS THE STRECH GOALS
AWESOME STRETCH GOALS:
3,000$ CAD - 8 more pages in your Digital or print copies of Sane6: Catalyst. Including Artwork, concept design from Rob Cannon and an additional parody comic strips of Sane6: Catalyst done by Kevin Parent.
4,000$ CAD - Every Backers will receive for FREE immediately when we will reach the Stretch Goal a Digital Kickstarter exclusive 12 pages book from the univers of Sane6. 
6,000$ CAD - A Sane6 Professional live-action short film will be done by the team of Acro Studio and Kevin Parent. Every Backers will receive it for FREE and in Early Access.
10,000$ CAD -  A SANE6 mini-series of animation will be produce and of course will be for FREE and in Early Access for every Backers.
MORE MISTERY STRETCH GOALS TO COME!
 VISION OF THE CREATOR
"I’m a self-taught artist and enjoy using visual art and storytelling as a media to translate ideas into physical being. Every time, I try to create something I’ve never seen before; this is my starting point.  
I enjoy working with a variety of digital and traditional media, mostly in stylized realism and surrealism. Though, frequently I force myself to work outside familiar media and techniques, so I can achieve a more diverse body of work. I focus on art and themes free of a social/political grounding and can be interpreted in different ways by viewers. To me, that is the mark of timelessness, and art that can be enjoyed by people regardless of their differences.  
My work has intrigued viewers, interested them, made them uncomfortable and inspired them to seek meaning where there is none. When I look at my art, I see an escape from the real, a constant challenge to improve, and a means of communication beyond spoken word."
-Rob Cannon
ABOUT ROB CANNON
Rob Cannon was born in Sacramento, California in 1989. He graduated American River College with an AA in Art in 2011. Rob works in a broad range of traditional and digital medium, with a focus on illustration. He has completed several graphic stories of varying length, four of them currently published. In 2010 he teamed up with writer Eric Myers to work on the nine part HARLEN MARTYR, and from there proceeded to collaborate with other writers including Alec Kerestesi, Tim Neumann, Christopher sides of Redshift Press, and started an ongoing qeue of solo projects. Rob has recently shown at several Sacarmanto shows and venues, and has operated a booth at two River City Marketplace events. He currently is pushing to comic and graphic novel illustration a full time occupation. He lives and works in Sacramento, California.
SANE6: WRECKAGE
Sane6: Wreckage is a short comic book (16 pages). Follow the characters Hyman Gores and Mitch Bighter, stuck in a mess that they could not have seen coming. The this reward is cheap, and will be sent immediately at the campaign's end.
Minimum Pledge: | DIGITAL COPY OF SANE6: WRECKAGE | (Only 3$ CAD)
PREVIEW OF SANE6: WRECKAGE
SANE6 POSTER
This awesome poster of Sane6 (Kickstarter Exclusive) will make yours the coolest house on the street. Art by the creator of Sane6, Rob Cannon.
Minimum Pledge: | PHYSICAL COPY OF SANE6: CATALYST + SANE6 POSTER | (24$ CAD)
SANE6 T-SHIRT
This beautiful Sane6 t-shirt with the color of your choice (between White & Red or Black & White). Wearing this t-shirt will make you one of the sexy people on earth. T-Shirt Art by Rob Cannon.
Minimum Pledge: | DIGITAL COPY OF SANE6: CATALYST + SANE6 T-SHIRT | (52$ CAD)
SANE6 KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE HARDCOVER BOOK
This hardcover book is offered exclusively for this campaign, and will not be available afterwards. This 100 page hardcover book contains Sane6: Wreckage (16 pages), Sane6: Catalyst (36 pages + 8 exclusive bonus pages) and 40 pages of artwork, concept art, exclusives interviews and exclusive comic strips. This is the perfect collector's item for the perfect backer.
(NOT FINAL ART COVER)
Minimum Pledge: | SANE6 KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE HARDCOVER BOOK | (72$ CAD)
THE ULTIMATE SANE6 KICKSTARTER BACKER PACK
This Pack includes everything from the campaign and even more (Exclusive contents only in this Reward).
Inside The Box:
- Campaign Backers Digital Gifts (Minimum of 2 per week) - Digital Exclusive Sane6 Art by Kevin Parent - Digital Copy of Sane6: Wreckage - Digital Copy of Sane6: Catalyst - Kevin Parent hand written personal thank you message - Sane6 Poster - Physical copy of Sane6: Catalyst – Regular cover signed by Rob Cannon and Kevin Parent - Physical copy of Sane6: Catalyst – Variant cover signed by Didier Mercadal, Rob Cannon and Kevin Parent - Sane6 T-Shirt – White & Red version - Sane6 T-Shirt – Black & White version - Sane6 Kickstarter Exclusive Hardcover Book signed by Rob Cannon, Kevin Parent and Didier Mercadal 
ALSO INCLUDED EXCLUSIVES CONTENTS: 
- Original art, done just for you, by Kevin Parent - Exclusive printed artwork from Rob Cannon with a personal message included. - Exclusive printed short comic book from the team of Sane6 - Printed version of Sane6: Wreckage signed by Rob Cannon and Kevin Parent 
Pledge : | THE ULTIMATE SANE6 KICKSTARTER BACKER PACK | (200$ CAD)
LAST WORDS FROM THE PRODUCER
First of all, thank you for the support. Every penny is one step closer to my dream, and being a part of it is the greatest honor you could give me. Rob Cannon is the first person in my life that I fell in love with artistically and professionally at the same time. He is a one of kind artist and human being, never stops working hard, and he deserves a place in the comic industry. (I could continue complimenting himself for as long of the lord of the ring franchise). What more do you want, a Criss Angel magic trick? Thank you to Rob Cannon, and our backers for giving a young boy the chance of living the dream.  
Special thanks to all the people for making this Kickstarter Campaign possible:
Rob Cannon (Thank you again for your talent bro), Mike Schneider (Thank you for everything. The Sane6 adventure started because of you.), Acro Studio (Thank for shooting and editing our Kickstarter Campaign, Hollywood is waiting for you), Didier Mercadal (Thank for being a friend and a mentor in life. Dude, look at your art! This should be at the Louvre museum. Thank you, your variant cover is awesome), Gabriel Guérin (Forever Bro, thanks for being so groovy. Without your help the Kickstarter presentation video would not exist. Thanks for your time, apartment, and of course, your hands). The group PaperGreen and The DJ WZRD (Thanks for your music! The Kickstarter presentation video would not be as good if your sounds and souls were not in it. Big career coming up for you my friend)
ABOUT KEVIN PARENT
He is a young entrepreneur and writing from Quebec,Canada. He left school at the age of 17 to live out his passion for movies. He became Co-owner of a Comic Book Store at the age of 18 years old and at the same time fell in love with the medium. Actually writing two comic book series «LIL’(American)HiTLER» (release date summer 2016, art currently in work), «Man Before Spaceman» (release date 2017). Also a one-shot comic book is in production named «Sky and Ground are close friends» (release date fall 2016). He will hit his directing and writing debut in film with his short film «L’Étoile Rainbow» (release fall 2016). Also, currently writing is first feature film «Me,Me and Me». Of course, he is also the producer of Sane6.
FOLLOW SANE6 ON FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/Sane6

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Over the passed couple years, I have learned a lot from doing crowdfunding. The NUMBER ONE most important thing I've learned is Communication. I will always be updating my backers on the progress of production.

We are Independent creators with full-time jobs and through the love of comic books, we've created a laundry list of things we have to add to our daily routines (writing, editing, illustrating, coloring, promoting, etc...) 

My challenges, in the past, were hitting delivery dates. But, as this issue is already a quarter of the way finished... we don't see a problem with that this time around.

Thanks for your your patience and support!

Tidewater Comicon May 21-22, 2016 will be the largest show we've ever attempted in Virginia Beach, Virginia and we need YOUR help to bring in more guests and an expanded space for all the fans!

Chris Claremont (Writer X-men, New Mutants, Excalibur)
John De Lancie (Q from Star Trek, Discord from My Little Pony)
Peter David (Writer X-Factor, Incredible Hulk, Spider-Man 2099)

Who is this show for?
Fans. Plain and simple. If you love Comic Books and Nerd Culture then Tidewater Comicon will feel like home to you. We want to bring you a large scale show you'll always remember.
Where does the money go?
All the funds raised will go directly to more convention space, more comic book creators, paid staff, advertising, and all the little behind the scenes things that go into making a show a success. Our 2015 show barely held the 16,000 record breaking crowd so our top priority is SPACE.

What can you get for your donation?
So glad you asked! We're happy to reward you with passes to the show, artist tables, vendor tables, prints from some of our favorite artists, and our EXCLUSIVE Convention Variants:

campaign.story:
Life is unfair, but what are you gonna do about it? If you’re James Contrell, a big-hearted country boy with a crappy job who’s living in a quiet town named Charity, you’re already aware of your own inadequacies. Very aware of them—your girlfriend just left you for an architect. Not just an architect, but a smug architect, who can offer a girl all the things a country boy can’t. James just has to face it; he’s a local boy who’s not going anywhere. Which is one of the reasons he’s lost at love; his girlfriend wanted to get out of Charity, and James realizes that he has a powerful connection to his sleepy little mountain hometown. James has to accept reality; he’s an ordinary guy in an ordinary place, not meant to do much but live an ordinary life.
But sometimes, it’s the guy who has learned to live without dreams who is best suited to handle a nightmare. That’s what happens one morning when he wakes up to discover that the town of Charity has been invaded by a bizarre occult army that calls itself “The Trust.” No problem now in searching for the meaning of life; James recognizes what he has to do, and that’s save Charity. He vows to help the local police department come to the town’s defense, arms up and leads the revolt against the invaders. “The Trust” is a cultish secret society that’s been taking over small towns like Charity. Step by step, small town by small town, “The Trust” has an agenda of its own that doesn’t bode well for anything—or anyone—that stands in its way.
James recognizes that he’s in for the fight of his life. But he’s not alone; James has allies in his battle.There’s “Gravy,” a loud, slightly paranoid mom-and-pop weapons manufacturer, whose munitions experiments tend to have mixed results. James and the sheriff are on the same side (or are they?), but there’s a complication: the sheriff has a daughter and James is dating her.
Fans of graphic novels who have an appreciation for metal, explosions, elaborate weaponry, occult rituals and conspiracy theories that are definitely “out there” will relish this campy action comedy, written by Bitros and illustrated by J. Matthew Root.
We are looking to raise $3000 to pay for the artwork, coloring, production and distribution. Completing the first two issue, which will be both be 24 pages of full color, will take approximately two weeks to a month.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
For Bitros, writing is a newly discovered passion. Although he’s toyed with story ideas for nearly a decade, he’s only recently found the motivation to commit those ideas in his head to reality. As a full-time dad and the manager of a bar, he’s working with other time commitments. Fortunately, he’s partnered with a mailing company that will work with him to distribute the product within the designated time frame. Bitros, a self-described film and comics geek, is counting on crowdfunding support to bring his character to the public. Crowdfunding can help James Contrell save those small towns.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
