campaign.story:
Super Natural
Who is Super Natural? Super Natural is a superhero character I created to be used as a supporting pivotal character in Anthony Piper’s superhero parody entitled “Trill League“. In the world Anthony created, she sticks out like a sore thumb in comparison to the other character’s personalities. This was intentional as she is designed to be a vehicle of "pseudo normality" that readers can anchor to when things get too crazy. Her name refers to her moral stance against portraying herself as anything but a natural black woman. This includes her appearance, her diet and her lifestyle. Super Natural is not from earth, yet she has come to make a home here after some quick transitions into city life. She is immensely powerful and nearly invulnerable to all physical damage, but not immune to the everyday stresses of living in American society.
Super Natural Tranquil Stretch
Super Natural Flying High
What is TRILL LEAGUE? Created by Anthony Piper, TRILL LEAGUE is an idea that started off with him drawing well-known superheroes but adding a bit of humor and urban edge to them. Having sparked hundreds of fan art submissions, becoming a trending topic on Google, and having thousands of shares on Tumblr and Facebook. Check it out if you haven't already. 
Trill League
What is the premise of the story? Super Natural is relatively new to this planet and has found herself in harsh adjustment to the ways of American culture and life. She will soon find that power breeds much more than just the ability to assert your will, but also fear and sharp critique from those that lack such power. 
She will have to deal with the media, the local law enforcement, the military and the US government itself as she learns firsthand that being powerful has powerful consequences. The first few books will be an origin story of sorts, an introduction to who Super Natural is, where she comes from and her daily life and reasons for being on earth. 
Who are the main characters? 
Deja Popper-  
Deja Popper
One of the closest and most valuable relationships that Super Natural will form very early on in her story will be with an amazing 5 year old named Deja Popper. Not only will Super Natural learn about the basics of earth and culture through this child(even though some of those basics will be flawed at times), Deja will be the very one to introduce the concept of becoming a superhero and what it means.
LaShawndra Popper-
LaShawndra Popper
  LaShawndra Popper is Deja's mother, and she's not at all too happy about her daughter's "friendship" with Super Natural. While she is an outstanding example of a hardworking single mother, LaShawndra has lived a rough life and is swift to shut down any ideas that go against her own no matter what. She wants what's best for her daughter and has been banished from at least two elementary schools for her sharp criticism of Deja's previous teachers. Sparks will fly in her opposition to Super Natural even remotely being near her daughter.
Bradey & Sofie Balogun-
The Baloguns
The Baloguns have lived as successful farmers for over 40 years until their health began to deteriorate. Their relationship with Super Natural started off simply as a supplier of fresh produce, but quickly formed into something very personal as she volunteered to help tend the land and other physically taxing responsibilities around the farm. Very few others have a such a intimate relationship with Super Natural to the point where she considers them as family. Wisdom is the invaluable gem given by the Baloguns and will help ready Super Natural for the worse to come.
So what is the purpose of this KICKSTARTER? As a freelance illustrator, every business decision has to have a very planned and thought out foundation, and self producing a comic book is no exception. Everything from producing the art, securing the right printer, paying for the print run, to delivery of such a product will take careful planning and tons of energy. 
Super Natural suit design
Kickstarter is a creator's way to determine if there are folks that actually want the product he or she is planning to create. If the campaign is successful, there's no doubt that all that planning will be justified. I would love to bring this character and story to life, and Kickstarter is one way to know if there's a people that actually agree.
.
Where will the money go if this campaign is successful? The initial goal is to raise $4,500 to produce the FIRST Chapter of the comic series. This will cover time to spend working on the comic and reward items as well as printing and shipping expenses. This is the bare minimum needed. The first issue of the comic consists of 22 pages of story, a character bio section and fan art gallery section, so any additional funds above the initial $4,500 will allow me to work on more issues of the comic, as well as collaborate with other talented artists to speed up productivity (see Stretch Goals below).
Super Natural suit design
Why do I believe this story should be made? Super Natural is more than a character at this point in her creation, and embodies many wonderful positive themes that comic readers both young and old, male or female can benefit from. Her story will address dozens of tough issues that very few comic publishers have ever dared to touch and I believe such a story is needed more than ever in these times. 
 BACKER REWARDS
 STRETCH GOALS
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As with any creative project, there is a chance of delay for presenting a final product. The date for delivery of all backer rewards is an estimated date for completion and printing. I will stay persistent in keeping all backers updated on progress of the project and any delays as they arise.

updates.update_userinfo: The road to Setting things right
updates.update_content:
Happy New year's eve and safe celebration to you all! I've finished the 2nd issue and will be sending off for proofs the 1st week of Jan. I'm testing everything for the official Super Natural Woman website and should be launching as soon as books have gone out to you guys. I've compiled a handful of pages to share with you guys so you can get a new sneak peak at the production and story. These sample pages will also be available to be seen on the website once it goes up. A million thanks for the patience with me while I've constructed this brand while I've restructured my approach to my artistic business from the ground up. 
Here's The Super Natural Woman and her young Superhero consultant, Deja Popper on her first flying tour of Garrison City. After finally locking in here hero suit, Deja expressed how amazing flying must be for Super Natural. Her excitement was through the roof when Super Natural offered to take her flying after patrol. I love this little kid. I'll keep the info flowing as it comes in,  more soon.

The Super Natural Woman has a whole world of updates brewing for the upcoming months. I'm working with a number of artist to help crank out the books so she can finally fly into the hearts and minds of you awesome folks at long last.  Nats Ledesma did me the honor of crafting this awesome action shot of Super Natural dealing with some mechanized threats. Tori Hunter manifested the lavishly colorful shot of SNW with a pallet that shows the warmer side of the heroine. The comic books along with a full website dedicated to everything SN is being put together for her debut and I'll be sure to blast it to the heavens when it's all ready. The Kickstarter copies will go out before the books go on sale so you guys will be the 1st to digest the story. These images below are a preview of a handful of additional posters that will arrive alongside the comics as perks for hanging in there with me for so long while I produce the books. I've apologized before for the delays, and I hate that I'm still having to do so. I want you all to know that this book is still very much one of my top priorities as it represents my 1st steps made towards defining myself as an independent creator. I'm proud of this character and the story I'm telling with her. Thank you guys for putting faith in my concept.

Here's the alternate cover that will come as an additional free poster with the 1st issue. Books will be mailed out this week, though there are some printed items that I planned to be tossed in the packages that got delayed due to the holidays. For the digital downloads, I'll put the link in an update this week as I'm putting the finishing touches on the webpage that will house everything Super Natural (Comics, Posters, Shirts, etc.). As a creator and artist of this project, I've been more than humbled by the changes made in my life by working to produce this book. To all my backers, you will forever have my gratitude for your continued patience during this process. My deepest apologies for the long wait. Thank you.
Just some additional poster art that will come with the issue ones going out by the end of the month. More to come.

Status Udates:
Hey all! I offer a thousand apologies for the well overdue updates, but there has been a ton of changes to the direction of the business of what I'm creating with The Super Natural Woman series. Just to be clear, I'm very aware that this project has taken WAY longer than anticipated, and I plan on adding extra goodies for each and every one of you backers that has made this book a reality when I send out the copies. Major changes have been made to the structure of how I was planning to publish the book and keep the book in circulation after the graphic novels are sent out to you backers, so I wanted to explain those to you guys.
Printer quote locked in, my next update will be with the books in hand. Thank you again everyone for your patience and support through all of this.

updates.update_userinfo: Additional Poster Art for all backers
updates.update_content:
Updating once again to say that the printing was delayed due to cost limitations. I've made some moves to go with another printer to save cost so I'll be able to add some extras when sending out the comics. Please forgive the inconvenience as I had hoped all this would have been locked in by now. I wanted to hold off on sending the digital copies out because I wanted the book to come out without spoilers. 
I'll be sending extra printed goodies along with the comics including posters, stickers and offering custom screen savers for all backers just to say thanks for all those who have been so patient with this long process. Thank you and I'll update you in two weeks.

campaign.story:
Jess Foley hasn’t given up on love, even if it has given up on her.  Jack Baldwin has given up and is planning a graceful self-destruction.  Maya Hill is trying to escape her life before it kills her.
Innovative Storytelling: no story has been told like this before
Running Flat (www.runningflatnovel.com) is a web-based novel that uses an electronic format to do things that novels usually can't do. It combines storytelling, photography, illustration, spoken word, music and web functionality to do things impossible to do on the printed page.  If books can be digital, why not do new and interesting things only possible in digital format?
A Novel in Episodes: Like a modern digital version of a Dickens novel, the story and art will be delivered in installments, straight to your inbox. And it will be continually updated to the Running Flat website.
The Reader Shapes the Novel: On the website, you decide how to read the story.  Each chapter will be sortable by character and plotline.  So if you want to read only the parts of the story that have Amadeo D’Onofrio, the man who once beat a man to death with a bag of doorknobs, you can click on his name and read just about him. If you want to read only the story about two people falling in love, you can click on that and read just that part of the novel. If you want to read the whole thing, in chronological order, of course you can do that too.
Great Writing: The story is written by Eric Maywar, who studied with short story rock-god Stu Dybek and American Book Award Winner Jaime Gordon
Great Art: The story is captured in breathtaking still photography by award-winning Tamara Ramos and beautiful paint by Bethany Sellers.  You can see more of their work at www.facebook.com/ramost32 and http://bethany-sellers/tumblr.com.
Jess from Running Flat
Here's what the bookbook tubers at Let's Talk About Books have to say about Running Flat https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l7lllxQXAdc&feature=youtu.be
Here's what Mercer Me wrote about Running Flat. https://www.facebook.com/#!/mercerme/photos/a.611657432190173.1073741827.607320849290498/970782012944378/?type=1&fref=nf
Check it out for yourself right now!  Visit www.runningflatnovel.com.  Sample chapters and art are available for you to browse along with full website functionality including sample embedded music and the ability to sort stories by characters and subplots.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We need to finish the photography and art. This entails identifying models, doing the photo-shoots, finishing post processing. This is not much of a risk, though, as the artists have been identified and have committed to the project.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
For the supporters of Running Flat, I am working on a new project I wanted to tell you about.
The Kickstarter has begun for our new collection of stories and poems called The Bookshop on Lafayette Street! See the link below.      
This collection is a love letter to used bookstores; everything that you love about them is here: books, the sense of wonder and discovery, the cozy clutter, idiosyncratic book lovers, and the feeling that you are in a haven buttressed against the cruelties of the world.

Since we hit our goal on the Kickstarter, the pledgers keep rolling in.  This is great, as it gives us some more flexibility for adding more bells and whistles to the website. 
We have three days to go.  We're introducing a stretch goal.  In the off chance we get to $6,000, we'll send a bonus gift--Running Flat bookmarks--to all pledgers including those that have already pledged--in addition to the rewards listed in the KickStarter.  (A bit funny since Running Flat is digital.)

This morning a flurry of donations brought us over the top of our goal!  Thank you all!
With this Kickstarter money, we'll be able to get the full compliment of art from Tamara Ramos and Bethany Sellers.
Next steps--finish the Kickstarter (any bonus money will go towards website development.)
Work with Tamara and Bethany on the art.  Work with Tanya and Yusef and the Blue Method on videos to embed.

A couple of Book Tubers at Let's Talk Books reviewed Running Flat.  You can see what they thought at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l7lllxQXAdc&feature=youtu.be
Let's Talk Books

Pledgers and prospective pledgers turned out tonight at Joe's Mill Hill Saloon to talk about Running Flat, eat, drink, bid on Tamara Ramos' art, buy tee-shirts and wait for Najah to get back with Cards Against Humanity.  Great fun!

Thank you all!
Today we officially are half way to our goal of $5,000--and we have 15 out of 30 days left.  Perfect!
If you know anybody who might be interested in a project that mixes story, photography, illustration, music and web functionality, please let that person know.  That could help us continue our momentum.

“Novel” Storytelling by Trenton’s Classics Bookstore Owner

An author, illustrator, musician and photographer walk into a bookstore…

Local Trentonian and Classics Bookstore owner, Eric Maywar, is creating of a new kind of storytellytelling in his blog-novel Running Flat (www.runningflatnovel.com) as he intertwines stories about people falling in love and smuggling and revenge. Combining storytelling, photography, illustration, spoken word and music, Running Flat accomplishes something that is impossible to do on the printed page.

campaign.story:
Welcome to the world of Dark Legacy. The planet of Titan is at war and the Kaiser, an evil battle-mage, is bringing this world to its knees. Anything is possible here and anyone can become a legend. This is where your journey begins.

Will you join the Kaiser and his allies in the total domination of the planet or will you be part of the opposition? You get to decide how this story will tell itself. Make sure to choose wisely, for the fate of the planet lies within your hands.

 It's time to Make your choice!
About this project.

Dark Legacy is a project that has the ability to give something to everyone. Instead of dividing the RPGers and the Card Gamers; this game has the ability to bring them both together in one game and keep them engaged with the story and possibilities of their own character's growth. Dark Legacy is a game that is easy to pick up and yet complicated enough through strategy to keep even the most experienced player entertained. It is my goal, with you help, to get this in the hands of hundreds of gamers so they can experience a different kind of gaming all together.
With this second set of Dark Legacy, named the Dragon Epoch, I have added a couple of things that will enhance the gameplay from the previous set, The Rising. In this set I am trying to involve the player even more in the storytelling aspect of this game. With the Dragon Epoch I am introducing Class cards. There will be 20 different classes to choose from in the Dragon Epoch. Each Class card will grant the player an innate ability that will be unique to that Class. The 20 classes for the Dragon Epoch are
Knight
Freerunner
Ninja
Sorcerer
Wizard
Tank
Healer
Fighter
Purist
Summoner
Alchemist
Hero
Villain
Scholar
Gunslinger
Thief
Blacksmith
Shifter
Ranger
Scout
I am going to use six specific classes within the Starter Decks for this set. Here is the breakdown of the six class going to be used

There will be a Holy Order faction Knight
There will be a Darkness faction Shifter
There will be a Tech faction Gunslinger
There will be a Chaos faction Wizard
There will be a Earth faction Summoner
There will be a Wind faction Freerunner
Another new aspect of Dark Legacy is going to be Skill cards. Each Class has a three skills that are unique them them and them only. There is a level 5, 10, and 15 skill cards. These cards will give a unique advantage and suggest a type of play style of each character. 
Here are the examples of both the Class abilities and Skills from each of the six classes that were mentioned above.
Lastly there is one big addition to Dark Legacy, DRAGONS. 
The addition of Dragons to this game bring an extra mechanic to creatures, DEGENERATION. Degeneration makes it so that the creature doesn't regenerate at the beginning of the controllers turn. Now this might sound bad but when your creature that has 150 defense points there needs to be a why to get rid of that creature. 

So if a creature has degeneration on it and takes damage, its overall defensive points go down. Once it is at 0 then the creature is destroyed just like any other creature. 
The Goal
My Kickstarter goal is set at $8,000 and this covers the minimum of costs to finish the art, edit, print and ship the game. The total of the funding goal is comprised of 10% Kickstarter fees and Amazon fees, 70% printing cost, 0% artist, layout, editing and development costs (since I am doing the majority of this myself), 10% promotional costs and 10% shipping costs. Should I be blessed enough to raise beyond the $8,000 target several things will happen: 
I have six pre-determined pledge amount stretch goal rewards and six pre-determined amount of people pledging stretch goal rewards to give everyone if we reach the goal. Everyone who pledges $20 or more will be included in the stretch goal rewards.
 This is the image for the first stretch goal by Milivoj Ceran.
 This is the image for the second stretch goal by Chrisyopher Rush.
About the game 
Dark Legacy is a unique strategy game that mixes the best elements of Magic the Gathering, Dungeons and Dragons and Chess and wraps them all up into a in-depth sci-fi/fantasy story. In Dark Legacy, players are no longer bystanders of the battle, they get to be part of it as a war general within one of six different factions. With the unique and various weapons, armor and relics, that a player can equip themselves with, players can become whomever they imagine themselves to be. 
In Dark Legacy, it is the players objective to destroy their opponents and their armies, by building a deck of magic spells that no one can withstand, rolling the d20 in their favor and strategically summoning their army to be the strongest. Just like in real battle you will have to anticipate the probability of the unexpected. Don't make choices too hastily for they may be the demise of your army and yourself.
Dark Legacy is a game that can be played one-on-one or in team battle, ages 10 and up, with an average play time of about 45 minutes.
Without Kickstarter backers, I wouldn't be able to produce this quality trading card game for the hobby market. To show my appreciation to those of you who are taking a chance on me, I promise that all games, PDFs and prints will be in the hands of backers before any copy will be available to others, whether it be through retailers, conventions or in my online store at dark-legacy.net. In addition, any items that are listed as limited editions will never be sold or distributed outside of this Kickstarter project. I would like to thank you again for your consideration and your support. Thank you very much!
Here are the basic type of cards that can be played in Dark Legacy
In addition to these cards there will be Class cards and Skill cards added to these basic types.
Here is some information about the playing mat.
Here is a video about the mechanics of the game.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
After my first Kickstarter I realized that the main issue I really have to deal with is the quality control of the cards. This time around I already have a printer and I have worked with them for a couple of projects so I know what to expect. I have a good group of people who will help with the construction of the decks once they arrive.

If any issue to arise I will let all of the backers know immediately and will keep them in the loop for the entire process so that they know where they stand and when they should receive their rewards.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
***UPDATE
Now Featured on FORBES.com
E.X.O. Featured on Forbes.com
WE REACHED OUR FIRST STRETCH GOAL!!! Now it's time to work towards goal #2!!!
****STRETCH GOAL #1 (REACHED!!!!!)******
So should we hit $8,000 everyone Hero Level 5 and up gets a FREE EXO character digital & print poster sent to them & signed by yours truly! I will also be donating 20 books to a local library to give out to kids & youths!
STRETCH GOAL #2
Should we hit $10,000, EVERYONE gets a KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE VARIANT COVER! The COVER will be EXCLUSIVE to backers ONLY and will come as a standalone print shipped with the book! And thats not all. I will also be giving out E.X.O. wallpapers for ALL devices to everyone! (See pics below in the rewards section).
STRETCH GOAL #3
Should we hit $12,000 we would immediately begin production of BOOK TWO! EVERYONE gets the first 10 pages of E.X.O. PART TWO!
More info & pictures below!
Hey guys! My name is Roye, and I am the creator and writer of E.X.O. I was born in Lagos, Nigeria, and I fell in love with superhero stories the first time I laid my eyes on the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles cartoon. In 2008, after noticing there was little diversity in superhero narratives, I decided to tell a story about a hero from Nigeria/Africa. I wanted to add something unique to the genre. To do so, I started YouNeek Studios and began work on E.X.O. - The Legend of Wale Williams Part One.
As seen on
Read more about E.X.O. on These Blogs
E.X.O. - The Legend of Wale Williams Part One Cover Page
My mission with E.X.O. - The Legend of Wale Williams is to put Africa on the map when it comes to telling superhero stories. As you can see from the trailer above, this whole thing started out as an animated project about 3 years ago, but due to several difficulties (financing, distribution etc.)  I decided to make it a book first. We have so many people with a wealth of creative and appealing stories on the continent, but they never really get the proper commercial exposure. I myself experienced this when I approached investors and distributors. I was told it was a great idea, but there was no fan base for this sort of product. But I refuse to believe that. I believe that if it’s done properly (with great script, good production values, etc.), people all over the world will be receptive. We don’t necessarily love characters like Superman, Batman or Spiderman because of where they are from. We love them because they have great stories we can identify with. That's why I took my time in developing the story and characters. I hope that E.X.O. will fulfil my lifelong goal of adding something unique to the superhero genre.
E.X.O. - The Legend of Wale Williams Part One Page 3
E.X.O. - The Legend of Wale Williams is a superhero story about redemption, set in a futuristic 2025 Africa. The graphic novel will be broken into two parts. Part one, which is 130 pages, is already halfway completed (with fully colored pages with lettering) and is set for release August 2015. You can read the first chapter for FREE right here on my website.
I started this Kickstarter campaign because I am on the last leg of this very long and amazing journey. Production costs have already been taken care of and all that's left is printing. Now I need YOU to help get this project over the finish line. I plan to send a completed part one (130 pages) of the book for print by the end of June. The estimated cost for 1000 copies is about $3500. 
So, friends, family and superhero fans all over the world, I humbly ask you for your help in making my lifelong dream come true by guaranteeing that E.X.O. becomes a reality!  Thank you all for your support!
E.X.O. - The Legend of Wale Williams Part One Page 4
Lagoon City, Nigeria 2025. Tricked into returning home to Nigeria after a five year absence, an impetuous young man named Wale (pronounced Wah-leh) Williams embarks on a journey to investigate his father’s mysterious disappearance. His only clue is a cryptic Nanosuit left behind for him by his father, a suit which grants superhuman abilities. As he comes to understand the suit’s powers, Wale realizes he must restore hope to the city by preventing catastrophic attacks from the sociopathic extremist, Oniku.
FURY Concept Art
The support I’ve gotten so far for this project has been nothing short of amazing. I’m greatly humbled by the number of people that have tweeted, retweeted, shared and blogged about E.X.O.
“The designs are very slick and futuristic, and ignore some of the design stereotypes which frequently turn up in many "African set" productions created by less intimate creators. At an initial glance, it has all of fast paced action and hi-tech superhero antics that you would expect of most animated action series on Cartoon Network or NickToons, only it is featuring a brand new hero for a brand new era. The world is a big place, and there's room for heroes from all lands in it. Keep an eye out for the first volume of "EXO: the Legend of Wale Williams" this summer!” Alex Widen | The Examiner
“In a time when the public is beginning to demand for a more diverse slate of superhero comics and movies, YouNeek Studios aims to fill that gap with a library of eclectic characters.” Jamie Broadnax | Black Girl Nerds
EXO certainly looks like a fun, well thought-out project, and something that could indeed go far towards putting Africa on the superhero fiction map. Justin | FEVA TV
E.X.O. T-Shirt Front/Back
PLAY

Your AD on the sponsor page (Subject to review, must be age appropriate)
Get your face/likeness in the book!
Producer Credit
Awesome Rewards
 For more details on each reward, please look to the sidebar to the right.
It would be disingenuous of me to act like I got here all by myself. Throughout this journey I have received an overwhelming amount of support from friends, family, fans and other independent creators from across the globe. However I want to take this opportunity to thank a special set of people. The team that have worked (and are currently working) on E.X.O. -
Ayodele Elegba: Editor
Sukanmi Akinboye: Artist (Pencils & Inks)
Raphael Kazeem: Colorist
Thanks, guys! This would not be possible without you.
E.X.O. - The Legend of Wale Williams Part One Page 18
The majority of the money would be put towards the printing of E.X.O. - The Legend of Wale Williams Part One. See the full breakdown below:
Campaign Fees (8%) - Kickstarter fees & credit card processing fees
Miscellaneous (10%) - ISBN/Barcodes, Rewards Production etc.
Printing -  (82%) - It will take roughly 2 months to have the books printed and shipped

E.X.O. Wallpapers

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
My hope is obviously for everything to go according to plan without any hiccups, but in reality you cannot plan for every contingency. There are certain factors that could get in the way of progress (e.g international printing/shipping issues). However my goal is to handle any issues, should they arise in a professional manner by sending out daily messages via the Kickstarter updates thread. I believe in 100% transparency and you guys deserve nothing less. I intend to keep every backer, fan and supporter informed by providing updates on a regular and timely manner.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
DINNER AT 6 is a dark look at what results from a marriage full of deceit, treachery, and secrets.  Roxy is the model wife.  For her, life is fulfilled.  She has a wonderful, successful career as a nurse; a beautiful, smart daughter; and a handsome, dedicated husband.  But every day, as she muses to herself, "what more could I ever want from life," little does she know darkness has already crept into her perfect life.

After fifteen years of marriage, Roxy's husband David comes home one day and tells her that he wants a divorce. This, of course, sends Roxy into a psychotic spin -- especially since he never even gives her a reason; he just walks right out!

Roxy spends the next three months lamenting over what she could have possibly done wrong.  She finally decides to take matters into her own hands -- because her marriage isn't going to end without her learning the truth.  And it's not going to end until she says it does...

A kidnapping, a cabin, and Dinner at 6.  One way, or another, Roxy will get her answers!
The message of this project is simply be yourself.  We live in a world where we are often told that we are not enough and that we won't be accepted if we truly live our truth.  What results from us often not living our truths when our lives are connected with other individuals is hurt and pain. There are families that are torn apart because deceit has lived with them for such a long time and the web of deceit becomes difficult to break.  This project in its own dark way is about how if we truly as a society allow others to live their truth in the best way that they can tragedies can sometimes be avoided.  
We're planning to put up the play and are scheduling for a two week, eight show run.  The funds we are raising from your generosity will go for the following items:  Theater rental and security deposit, advertising and promotion, materials and labor for set construction, makeup, props, costumes, and more.
In addition to the play, we also plan to shoot a short film version of the story for entry into film festivals.  And so, a portion of the funds raised will pay for lights, cameras, and other production equipment, as well as the location, and any fees required by the Screen Actor's Guild -- this will be a SAG endeavor.  We also need to pay for makeup for special effects -- that's gonna be a surprise -- and a number of other small and not so small items necessary for  creating a top notch production.
